 2155: 
 2156: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 2157: %% Create several sockets, monitor from a different process then exit
 2158: %% the owner process.
 2159: %% The process that did the monitor shall receive a socket DOWN.
 2160: 
 2161: monitor_open_and_exit_multi_socks(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 2162:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
 2163:     tc_try(monitor_open_and_exit_multi_socks,
 2164:            fun() ->
 2165: 		   InitState = #{domain   => inet,
 2166:                                  type     => stream,
 2167:                                  protocol => tcp},
 2168:                    ok = mon_open_and_exit_multi_socks(InitState)
 2169:            end).
 2170: 
 2171: 
 2172: mon_open_and_exit_multi_socks(InitState) ->
 2173:     OwnerSeq =
 2174:         [
 2175:          %% *** Wait for start order part ***
 2176:          #{desc => "await start (from tester)",
 2177:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
 2178:                            Tester = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
 2179:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester}}
 2180:                    end},
 2181:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
 2182:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
 2183:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
 2184:                            ok
 2185:                    end},
 2186: 
 2187:          %% *** Init part ***
 2188:          #{desc => "create socket 1",
 2189:            cmd  => fun(#{domain   := Domain, 
 2190:                          type     := Type, 
 2191:                          protocol := Proto} = State) ->
 2192:                            case socket:open(Domain, Type, Proto) of
 2193:                                {ok, Sock} ->
 2194:                                    {ok, State#{sock1 => Sock}};
 2195:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 2196:                                    ERROR
 2197:                            end
 2198:                    end},
 2199:          #{desc => "create socket 2",
 2200:            cmd  => fun(#{domain   := Domain, 
 2201:                          type     := Type, 
 2202:                          protocol := Proto} = State) ->
 2203:                            case socket:open(Domain, Type, Proto) of
 2204:                                {ok, Sock} ->
 2205:                                    {ok, State#{sock2 => Sock}};
 2206:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 2207:                                    ERROR
 2208:                            end
 2209:                    end},
 2210:          #{desc => "create socket 3",
 2211:            cmd  => fun(#{domain   := Domain, 
 2212:                          type     := Type, 
 2213:                          protocol := Proto} = State) ->
 2214:                            case socket:open(Domain, Type, Proto) of
 2215:                                {ok, Sock} ->
 2216:                                    {ok, State#{sock3 => Sock}};
 2217:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 2218:                                    ERROR
 2219:                            end
 2220:                    end},
 2221:          #{desc => "create socket 4",
 2222:            cmd  => fun(#{domain   := Domain, 
 2223:                          type     := Type, 
 2224:                          protocol := Proto} = State) ->
 2225:                            case socket:open(Domain, Type, Proto) of
 2226:                                {ok, Sock} ->
 2227:                                    {ok, State#{sock4 => Sock}};
 2228:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 2229:                                    ERROR
 2230:                            end
 2231:                    end},
 2232:          #{desc => "create socket 5",
 2233:            cmd  => fun(#{domain   := Domain, 
 2234:                          type     := Type, 
 2235:                          protocol := Proto} = State) ->
 2236:                            case socket:open(Domain, Type, Proto) of
 2237:                                {ok, Sock} ->
 2238:                                    {ok, State#{sock5 => Sock}};
 2239:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 2240:                                    ERROR
 2241:                            end
 2242:                    end},
 2243:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
 2244:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester,
 2245: 			 sock1  := Sock1,
 2246: 			 sock2  := Sock2,
 2247: 			 sock3  := Sock3,
 2248: 			 sock4  := Sock4,
 2249: 			 sock5  := Sock5} = _State) ->
 2250: 			   Socks = [Sock1, Sock2, Sock3, Sock4, Sock5],
 2251:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init, Socks),
 2252:                            ok
 2253:                    end},
 2254: 
 2255: 
 2256:          %% The actual test
 2257:          #{desc => "await terminate (from tester)",
 2258:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
 2259:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
 2260:                                ok ->
 2261:                                    {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
 2262:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 2263:                                    ERROR
 2264:                            end
 2265:                    end},
 2266: 
 2267:          %% *** We are done ***
 2268:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 2269:         ],
 2270: 
 2271:     TesterSeq =
 2272:         [
 2273:          %% *** Init part ***
 2274:          #{desc => "monitor owner",
 2275:            cmd  => fun(#{owner := Owner} = _State) ->
 2276:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Owner),
 2277:                            ok
 2278:                    end},
 2279:          #{desc => "order (owner) start",
 2280:            cmd  => fun(#{owner := Pid} = _State) ->
 2281:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid),
 2282:                            ok
 2283:                    end},
 2284:          #{desc => "await (owner) ready",
 2285:            cmd  => fun(#{owner := Pid} = State) ->
 2286:                            {ok, [Sock1, Sock2, Sock3, Sock4, Sock5]} =
 2287: 			       ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, owner, init),
 2288:                            {ok, State#{sock1 => Sock1,
 2289: 				       sock2 => Sock2,
 2290: 				       sock3 => Sock3,
 2291: 				       sock4 => Sock4,
 2292: 				       sock5 => Sock5}}
 2293:                    end},
 2294:          #{desc => "verify total number of monitors (=0)",
 2295:            cmd  => fun(_State) ->
 2296: 			   0 = socket:number_of_monitors(),
 2297: 			   ok
 2298:                    end},
 2299:          #{desc => "verify own number of monitors (=0)",
 2300:            cmd  => fun(_State) ->
 2301: 			   0 = socket:number_of_monitors(self()),
 2302: 			   ok
 2303:                    end},
 2304:          #{desc => "monitor socket",
 2305:            cmd  => fun(#{sock1 := Sock1,
 2306: 			 sock2 := Sock2,
 2307: 			 sock3 := Sock3,
 2308: 			 sock4 := Sock4,
 2309: 			 sock5 := Sock5} = State) ->
 2310:                            MRef1 = socket:monitor(Sock1),
 2311:                            MRef2 = socket:monitor(Sock2),
 2312:                            MRef3 = socket:monitor(Sock3),
 2313:                            MRef4 = socket:monitor(Sock4),
 2314:                            MRef5 = socket:monitor(Sock5),
 2315: 			   ?SEV_IPRINT("Monitors:"
 2316: 				       "~n   1: ~p"
 2317: 				       "~n   2: ~p"
 2318: 				       "~n   3: ~p"
 2319: 				       "~n   4: ~p"
 2320: 				       "~n   5: ~p",
 2321: 				       [MRef1, MRef2, MRef3, MRef4, MRef5]),
 2322: 			   {ok, State#{mon1 => MRef1,
 2323: 				       mon2 => MRef2,
 2324: 				       mon3 => MRef3,
 2325: 				       mon4 => MRef4,
 2326: 				       mon5 => MRef5}}
 2327:                    end},
 2328:          #{desc => "verify total number of monitors (=5)",
 2329:            cmd  => fun(_State) ->
 2330: 			   5 = socket:number_of_monitors(),
 2331: 			   ok
 2332:                    end},
 2333:          #{desc => "verify own number of monitors (=5)",
 2334:            cmd  => fun(_State) ->
 2335: 			   5 = socket:number_of_monitors(self()),
 2336: 			   ok
 2337:                    end},
 2338: 
 2339:          %% The actual test
 2340:          #{desc => "order (owner) terminate",
 2341:            cmd  => fun(#{owner := Pid} = _State) ->
 2342:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Pid),
 2343:                            ok
 2344:                    end},
 2345: 
 2346:          #{desc => "await (owner) termination",
 2347:            cmd  => fun(#{owner := Pid} = _State) ->
 2348:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Pid) of
 2349:                                ok ->
 2350:                                    ok;
 2351:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 2352:                                    ERROR
 2353:                            end
 2354:                    end},
 2355: 
 2356:          #{desc => "await socket 1 down",
 2357:            cmd  => fun(#{sock1 := Sock,
 2358: 			 mon1  := MRef} = State) ->
 2359: 			   receive
 2360: 			       {'DOWN', MRef, socket, Sock, Info} ->
 2361: 				   ?SEV_IPRINT("received expected down: "
 2362: 					       "~n      MRef:   ~p"
 2363: 					       "~n      Socket: ~p"
 2364: 					       "~n      Info:   ~p",
 2365: 					       [MRef, Sock, Info]),
 2366: 				   State2 = maps:remove(sock1, State),
 2367: 				   State3 = maps:remove(mon1,  State2),
 2368: 				   {ok, State3}
 2369: 			   after 5000 ->
 2370: 				   ?SEV_EPRINT("socket down timeout"),
 2371: 				   {error, timeout}
 2372: 			   end
 2373:                    end},
 2374:          #{desc => "await socket 2 down",
 2375:            cmd  => fun(#{sock2 := Sock,
 2376: 			 mon2  := MRef} = State) ->
 2377: 			   receive
 2378: 			       {'DOWN', MRef, socket, Sock, Info} ->
 2379: 				   ?SEV_IPRINT("received expected down: "
 2380: 					       "~n      MRef:   ~p"
 2381: 					       "~n      Socket: ~p"
 2382: 					       "~n      Info:   ~p",
 2383: 					       [MRef, Sock, Info]),
 2384: 				   State2 = maps:remove(sock2, State),
 2385: 				   State3 = maps:remove(mon2,  State2),
 2386: 				   {ok, State3}
 2387: 			   after 5000 ->
 2388: 				   ?SEV_EPRINT("socket down timeout"),
 2389: 				   {error, timeout}
 2390: 			   end
 2391:                    end},
 2392:          #{desc => "await socket 3 down",
 2393:            cmd  => fun(#{sock3 := Sock,
 2394: 			 mon3  := MRef} = State) ->
 2395: 			   receive
 2396: 			       {'DOWN', MRef, socket, Sock, Info} ->
 2397: 				   ?SEV_IPRINT("received expected down: "
 2398: 					       "~n      MRef:   ~p"
 2399: 					       "~n      Socket: ~p"
 2400: 					       "~n      Info:   ~p",
 2401: 					       [MRef, Sock, Info]),
 2402: 				   State2 = maps:remove(sock3, State),
 2403: 				   State3 = maps:remove(mon3,  State2),
 2404: 				   {ok, State3}
 2405: 			   after 5000 ->
 2406: 				   ?SEV_EPRINT("socket down timeout"),
 2407: 				   {error, timeout}
 2408: 			   end
 2409:                    end},
 2410:          #{desc => "await socket 4 down",
 2411:            cmd  => fun(#{sock4 := Sock,
 2412: 			 mon4  := MRef} = State) ->
 2413: 			   receive
 2414: 			       {'DOWN', MRef, socket, Sock, Info} ->
 2415: 				   ?SEV_IPRINT("received expected down: "
 2416: 					       "~n      MRef:   ~p"
 2417: 					       "~n      Socket: ~p"
 2418: 					       "~n      Info:   ~p",
 2419: 					       [MRef, Sock, Info]),
 2420: 				   State2 = maps:remove(sock4, State),
 2421: 				   State3 = maps:remove(mon4,  State2),
 2422: 				   {ok, State3}
 2423: 			   after 5000 ->
 2424: 				   ?SEV_EPRINT("socket down timeout"),
 2425: 				   {error, timeout}
 2426: 			   end
 2427:                    end},
 2428:          #{desc => "await socket 5 down",
 2429:            cmd  => fun(#{sock5 := Sock,
 2430: 			 mon5  := MRef} = State) ->
 2431: 			   receive
 2432: 			       {'DOWN', MRef, socket, Sock, Info} ->
 2433: 				   ?SEV_IPRINT("received expected down: "
 2434: 					       "~n      MRef:   ~p"
 2435: 					       "~n      Socket: ~p"
 2436: 					       "~n      Info:   ~p",
 2437: 					       [MRef, Sock, Info]),
 2438: 				   State2 = maps:remove(sock5, State),
 2439: 				   State3 = maps:remove(mon5,  State2),
 2440: 				   {ok, State3}
 2441: 			   after 5000 ->
 2442: 				   ?SEV_EPRINT("socket down timeout"),
 2443: 				   {error, timeout}
 2444: 			   end
 2445:                    end},
 2446:          #{desc => "verify total number of monitors (=0)",
 2447:            cmd  => fun(_State) ->
 2448: 			   0 = socket:number_of_monitors(),
 2449: 			   ok
 2450:                    end},
 2451:          #{desc => "verify own number of monitors (=0)",
 2452:            cmd  => fun(_State) ->
 2453: 			   0 = socket:number_of_monitors(self()),
 2454: 			   ok
 2455:                    end},
 2456: 
 2457:          %% *** We are done ***
 2458:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 2459:         ],
 2460: 
 2461:     i("start (socket) owner evaluator"),
 2462:     Owner = ?SEV_START("owner", OwnerSeq, InitState),
 2463: 
 2464:     i("start tester evaluator"),
 2465:     TesterInitState = #{owner => Owner#ev.pid},
 2466:     Tester = ?SEV_START("tester", TesterSeq, TesterInitState),
 2467: 
 2468:     i("await evaluator"),
 2469:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Owner, Tester]).
 2470: 
 2471: 
 2472: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 2473: %% Create several sockets, monitor from a different process, demonitor
 2474: %% two of them then close socket.
 2475: %% The process that did the monitor shall receive a socket DOWN for
 2476: %% the sockets that are still monitored.
 2477: 
 2478: monitor_open_and_demon_and_close_multi_socks(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 2479:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
 2480:     tc_try(monitor_open_and_demon_and_close_multi_socks,
 2481:            fun() ->
 2482: 		   InitState = #{domain   => inet,
 2483:                                  type     => stream,
 2484:                                  protocol => tcp},
 2485:                    ok = mon_open_and_demon_and_close_multi_socks(InitState)
 2486:            end).
 2487: 
 2488: 
 2489: mon_open_and_demon_and_close_multi_socks(InitState) ->
 2490:     OwnerSeq =
 2491:         [
 2492:          %% *** Wait for start order part ***
 2493:          #{desc => "await start (from tester)",
 2494:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
 2495:                            Tester = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
 2496:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester}}
 2497:                    end},
 2498:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
 2499:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
 2500:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
 2501:                            ok
 2502:                    end},
 2503: 
 2504:          %% *** Init part ***
 2505:          #{desc => "create socket 1",
 2506:            cmd  => fun(#{domain   := Domain, 
 2507:                          type     := Type, 
 2508:                          protocol := Proto} = State) ->
 2509:                            case socket:open(Domain, Type, Proto) of
 2510:                                {ok, Sock} ->
 2511:                                    {ok, State#{sock1 => Sock}};
 2512:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 2513:                                    ERROR
 2514:                            end
 2515:                    end},
 2516:          #{desc => "create socket 2",
 2517:            cmd  => fun(#{domain   := Domain, 
 2518:                          type     := Type, 
 2519:                          protocol := Proto} = State) ->
 2520:                            case socket:open(Domain, Type, Proto) of
 2521:                                {ok, Sock} ->
 2522:                                    {ok, State#{sock2 => Sock}};
 2523:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 2524:                                    ERROR
 2525:                            end
 2526:                    end},
 2527:          #{desc => "create socket 3",
 2528:            cmd  => fun(#{domain   := Domain, 
 2529:                          type     := Type, 
 2530:                          protocol := Proto} = State) ->
 2531:                            case socket:open(Domain, Type, Proto) of
 2532:                                {ok, Sock} ->
 2533:                                    {ok, State#{sock3 => Sock}};
 2534:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 2535:                                    ERROR
 2536:                            end
 2537:                    end},
 2538:          #{desc => "create socket 4",
 2539:            cmd  => fun(#{domain   := Domain, 
 2540:                          type     := Type, 
 2541:                          protocol := Proto} = State) ->
 2542:                            case socket:open(Domain, Type, Proto) of
 2543:                                {ok, Sock} ->
 2544:                                    {ok, State#{sock4 => Sock}};
 2545:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 2546:                                    ERROR
 2547:                            end
 2548:                    end},
 2549:          #{desc => "create socket 5",
 2550:            cmd  => fun(#{domain   := Domain, 
 2551:                          type     := Type, 
 2552:                          protocol := Proto} = State) ->
 2553:                            case socket:open(Domain, Type, Proto) of
 2554:                                {ok, Sock} ->
 2555:                                    {ok, State#{sock5 => Sock}};
 2556:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 2557:                                    ERROR
 2558:                            end
 2559:                    end},
 2560:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
 2561:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester,
 2562: 			 sock1  := Sock1,
 2563: 			 sock2  := Sock2,
 2564: 			 sock3  := Sock3,
 2565: 			 sock4  := Sock4,
 2566: 			 sock5  := Sock5} = _State) ->
 2567: 			   Socks = [Sock1, Sock2, Sock3, Sock4, Sock5],
 2568:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init, Socks),
 2569:                            ok
 2570:                    end},
 2571: 
 2572:          %% The actual test
 2573:          #{desc => "await continue (close1)",
 2574:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 2575:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, close1)
 2576:                    end},
 2577:          #{desc => "close socket 1",
 2578:            cmd  => fun(#{sock1 := Sock} = State) ->
 2579:                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
 2580: 			   {ok, maps:remove(sock1, State)}
 2581:                    end},
 2582: 
 2583:          #{desc => "await continue (close3)",
 2584:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 2585:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, close3)
 2586:                    end},
 2587:          #{desc => "close socket 3",
 2588:            cmd  => fun(#{sock3 := Sock} = State) ->
 2589:                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
 2590: 			   {ok, maps:remove(sock3, State)}
 2591:                    end},
 2592: 
 2593:          #{desc => "await continue (close5)",
 2594:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 2595:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, close5)
 2596:                    end},
 2597:          #{desc => "close socket 5",
 2598:            cmd  => fun(#{sock5 := Sock} = State) ->
 2599:                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
 2600: 			   {ok, maps:remove(sock5, State)}
 2601:                    end},
 2602: 
 2603:          #{desc => "await terminate (from tester)",
 2604:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
 2605:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
 2606:                                ok ->
 2607:                                    {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
 2608:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 2609:                                    ERROR
 2610:                            end
 2611:                    end},
 2612: 
 2613:          %% *** We are done ***
 2614:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 2615:         ],
 2616: 
 2617:     TesterSeq =
 2618:         [
 2619:          %% *** Init part ***
 2620:          #{desc => "monitor owner",
 2621:            cmd  => fun(#{owner := Owner} = _State) ->
 2622:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Owner),
 2623:                            ok
 2624:                    end},
 2625:          #{desc => "order (owner) start",
 2626:            cmd  => fun(#{owner := Pid} = _State) ->
 2627:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid),
 2628:                            ok
 2629:                    end},
 2630:          #{desc => "await (owner) ready",
 2631:            cmd  => fun(#{owner := Pid} = State) ->
 2632:                            {ok, [Sock1, Sock2, Sock3, Sock4, Sock5]} =
 2633: 			       ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, owner, init),
 2634:                            {ok, State#{sock1 => Sock1,
 2635: 				       sock2 => Sock2,
 2636: 				       sock3 => Sock3,
 2637: 				       sock4 => Sock4,
 2638: 				       sock5 => Sock5}}
 2639:                    end},
 2640:          #{desc => "verify total number of monitors (=0)",
 2641:            cmd  => fun(_State) ->
 2642: 			   0 = socket:number_of_monitors(),
 2643: 			   ok
 2644:                    end},
 2645:          #{desc => "verify own number of monitors (=0)",
 2646:            cmd  => fun(_State) ->
 2647: 			   0 = socket:number_of_monitors(self()),
 2648: 			   ok
 2649:                    end},
 2650:          #{desc => "monitor socket",
 2651:            cmd  => fun(#{sock1 := Sock1,
 2652: 			 sock2 := Sock2,
 2653: 			 sock3 := Sock3,
 2654: 			 sock4 := Sock4,
 2655: 			 sock5 := Sock5} = State) ->
 2656:                            MRef1 = socket:monitor(Sock1),
 2657:                            MRef2 = socket:monitor(Sock2),
 2658:                            MRef3 = socket:monitor(Sock3),
 2659:                            MRef4 = socket:monitor(Sock4),
 2660:                            MRef5 = socket:monitor(Sock5),
 2661: 			   ?SEV_IPRINT("Monitors:"
 2662: 				       "~n   1: ~p"
 2663: 				       "~n   2: ~p"
 2664: 				       "~n   3: ~p"
 2665: 				       "~n   4: ~p"
 2666: 				       "~n   5: ~p",
 2667: 				       [MRef1, MRef2, MRef3, MRef4, MRef5]),
 2668: 			   {ok, State#{mon1 => MRef1,
 2669: 				       mon2 => MRef2,
 2670: 				       mon3 => MRef3,
 2671: 				       mon4 => MRef4,
 2672: 				       mon5 => MRef5}}
 2673:                    end},
 2674:          #{desc => "verify total number of monitors (=5)",
 2675:            cmd  => fun(_State) ->
 2676: 			   5 = socket:number_of_monitors(),
 2677: 			   ok
 2678:                    end},
 2679:          #{desc => "verify own number of monitors (=5)",
 2680:            cmd  => fun(_State) ->
 2681: 			   5 = socket:number_of_monitors(self()),
 2682: 			   ok
 2683:                    end},
 2684: 
 2685:          %% The actual test
 2686:          #{desc => "demonitor socket(s)",
 2687:            cmd  => fun(#{mon2 := MRef2,
 2688: 			 mon4 := MRef4} = State) ->
 2689:                            true = socket:cancel_monitor(MRef2),
 2690:                            true = socket:cancel_monitor(MRef4),
 2691: 			   ?SEV_IPRINT("cancel socket monitor 2 and 4"),
 2692: 			   State2 = maps:remove(mon2,  State),
 2693: 			   State3 = maps:remove(sock2, State2),
 2694: 			   State4 = maps:remove(mon4,  State3),
 2695: 			   State5 = maps:remove(sock4, State4),
 2696: 			   {ok, State5}
 2697:                    end},
 2698:          #{desc => "verify total number of monitors (=3)",
 2699:            cmd  => fun(_State) ->
 2700: 			   3 = socket:number_of_monitors(),
 2701: 			   ok
 2702:                    end},
 2703:          #{desc => "verify own number of monitors (=3)",
 2704:            cmd  => fun(_State) ->
 2705: 			   3 = socket:number_of_monitors(self()),
 2706: 			   ok
 2707:                    end},
 2708:          #{desc => "order owner to close socket 1",
 2709:            cmd  => fun(#{owner := Pid} = _State) ->
 2710:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, close1),
 2711:                            ok
 2712:                    end},
 2713:          #{desc => "await socket 1 down",
 2714:            cmd  => fun(#{sock1 := Sock,
 2715: 			 mon1  := MRef} = State) ->
 2716: 			   receive
 2717: 			       {'DOWN', MRef, socket, Sock, Info} ->
 2718: 				   ?SEV_IPRINT("received expected down: "
 2719: 					       "~n      MRef:   ~p"
 2720: 					       "~n      Socket: ~p"
 2721: 					       "~n      Info:   ~p",
 2722: 					       [MRef, Sock, Info]),
 2723: 				   State2 = maps:remove(sock1, State),
 2724: 				   State3 = maps:remove(mon1,  State2),
 2725: 				   {ok, State3}
 2726: 			   after 5000 ->
 2727: 				   ?SEV_EPRINT("socket down timeout"),
 2728: 				   {error, timeout}
 2729: 			   end
 2730:                    end},
 2731:          #{desc => "verify total number of monitors (=2)",
 2732:            cmd  => fun(_State) ->
 2733: 			   2 = socket:number_of_monitors(),
 2734: 			   ok
 2735:                    end},
 2736:          #{desc => "verify own number of monitors (=2)",
 2737:            cmd  => fun(_State) ->
 2738: 			   2 = socket:number_of_monitors(self()),
 2739: 			   ok
 2740:                    end},
 2741: 
 2742:          #{desc => "order owner to close socket 3",
 2743:            cmd  => fun(#{owner := Pid} = _State) ->
 2744:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, close3),
 2745:                            ok
 2746:                    end},
 2747:          #{desc => "await socket 3 down",
 2748:            cmd  => fun(#{sock3 := Sock,
 2749: 			 mon3  := MRef} = State) ->
 2750: 			   receive
 2751: 			       {'DOWN', MRef, socket, Sock, Info} ->
 2752: 				   ?SEV_IPRINT("received expected down: "
 2753: 					       "~n      MRef:   ~p"
 2754: 					       "~n      Socket: ~p"
 2755: 					       "~n      Info:   ~p",
 2756: 					       [MRef, Sock, Info]),
 2757: 				   State2 = maps:remove(sock3, State),
 2758: 				   State3 = maps:remove(mon3,  State2),
 2759: 				   {ok, State3}
 2760: 			   after 5000 ->
 2761: 				   ?SEV_EPRINT("socket down timeout"),
 2762: 				   {error, timeout}
 2763: 			   end
 2764:                    end},
 2765:          #{desc => "verify total number of monitors (=1)",
 2766:            cmd  => fun(_State) ->
 2767: 			   1 = socket:number_of_monitors(),
 2768: 			   ok
 2769:                    end},
 2770:          #{desc => "verify own number of monitors (=1)",
 2771:            cmd  => fun(_State) ->
 2772: 			   1 = socket:number_of_monitors(self()),
 2773: 			   ok
 2774:                    end},
 2775: 
 2776:          #{desc => "order owner to close socket 5",
 2777:            cmd  => fun(#{owner := Pid} = _State) ->
 2778:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, close5),
 2779:                            ok
 2780:                    end},
 2781:          #{desc => "await socket 5 down",
 2782:            cmd  => fun(#{sock5 := Sock,
 2783: 			 mon5  := MRef} = State) ->
 2784: 			   receive
 2785: 			       {'DOWN', MRef, socket, Sock, Info} ->
 2786: 				   ?SEV_IPRINT("received expected down: "
 2787: 					       "~n      MRef:   ~p"
 2788: 					       "~n      Socket: ~p"
 2789: 					       "~n      Info:   ~p",
 2790: 					       [MRef, Sock, Info]),
 2791: 				   State2 = maps:remove(sock5, State),
 2792: 				   State3 = maps:remove(mon5,  State2),
 2793: 				   {ok, State3}
 2794: 			   after 5000 ->
 2795: 				   ?SEV_EPRINT("socket down timeout"),
 2796: 				   {error, timeout}
 2797: 			   end
 2798:                    end},
 2799:          #{desc => "verify total number of monitors (=0)",
 2800:            cmd  => fun(_State) ->
 2801: 			   0 = socket:number_of_monitors(),
 2802: 			   ok
 2803:                    end},
 2804:          #{desc => "verify own number of monitors (=0)",
 2805:            cmd  => fun(_State) ->
 2806: 			   0 = socket:number_of_monitors(self()),
 2807: 			   ok
 2808:                    end},
 2809: 
 2810:          %% Cleanup
 2811:          #{desc => "order (owner) terminate",
 2812:            cmd  => fun(#{owner := Pid} = _State) ->
 2813:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Pid),
 2814:                            ok
 2815:                    end},
 2816: 
 2817:          #{desc => "await (owner) termination",
 2818:            cmd  => fun(#{owner := Pid} = _State) ->
 2819:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Pid) of
 2820:                                ok ->
 2821:                                    ok;
 2822:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 2823:                                    ERROR
 2824:                            end
 2825:                    end},
 2826: 
 2827:          %% *** We are done ***
 2828:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 2829:         ],
 2830: 
 2831:     i("start (socket) owner evaluator"),
 2832:     Owner = ?SEV_START("owner", OwnerSeq, InitState),
 2833: 
 2834:     i("start tester evaluator"),
 2835:     TesterInitState = #{owner => Owner#ev.pid},
 2836:     Tester = ?SEV_START("tester", TesterSeq, TesterInitState),
 2837: 
 2838:     i("await evaluator"),
 2839:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Owner, Tester]).
 2840: 
 2841: 
 2842: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 2843: %% Create one socket (by 'owner' process), monitor from several different
 2844: %% processes, then close socket (from 'owner').
 2845: %% The processes that did the monitor shall receive a socket DOWN.
 2846: 
 2847: monitor_open_and_close_multi_mon(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 2848:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
 2849:     tc_try(monitor_open_and_close_multi_mon,
 2850:            fun() ->
 2851: 		   InitState = #{domain   => inet,
 2852:                                  type     => stream,
 2853:                                  protocol => tcp},
 2854:                    ok = mon_open_and_close_multi_mon(InitState)
 2855:            end).
 2856: 
 2857: 
 2858: mon_open_and_close_multi_mon(InitState) ->
 2859:     OwnerSeq =
 2860:         [
 2861:          %% *** Wait for start order part ***
 2862:          #{desc => "await start (from tester)",
 2863:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
 2864:                            Tester = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
 2865:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester}}
 2866:                    end},
 2867:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
 2868:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
 2869:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
 2870:                            ok
 2871:                    end},
 2872: 
 2873:          %% *** Init part ***
 2874:          #{desc => "create socket",
 2875:            cmd  => fun(#{domain   := Domain, 
 2876:                          type     := Type, 
 2877:                          protocol := Proto} = State) ->
 2878:                            case socket:open(Domain, Type, Proto) of
 2879:                                {ok, Sock} ->
 2880:                                    {ok, State#{sock => Sock}};
 2881:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 2882:                                    ERROR
 2883:                            end
 2884:                    end},
 2885:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
 2886:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester, sock := Sock} = _State) ->
 2887:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init, Sock),
 2888:                            ok
 2889:                    end},
 2890: 
 2891:          %% The actual test
 2892:          #{desc => "await continue (close)",
 2893:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 2894:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, close)
 2895:                    end},
 2896: 
 2897:          #{desc => "close socket",
 2898:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = State) ->
 2899:                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
 2900: 			   {ok, maps:remove(sock, State)}
 2901:                    end},
 2902: 
 2903: 
 2904:          #{desc => "await terminate (from tester)",
 2905:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
 2906:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
 2907:                                ok ->
 2908:                                    {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
 2909:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 2910:                                    ERROR
 2911:                            end
 2912:                    end},
 2913: 
 2914:          %% *** We are done ***
 2915:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 2916:         ],
 2917: 
 2918: 
 2919:     ClientSeq =
 2920:         [
 2921:          %% *** Wait for start order part ***
 2922:          #{desc => "await start (from tester)",

 2925:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester}}
 2926:                    end},

 2974:                    end},

 2984: 			   receive
 2985: 			       {'DOWN', MRef, socket, Sock, Info} ->
 2986: 				   ?SEV_IPRINT("received expected down: "

 2988: 					       "~n      Socket: ~p"
 2989: 					       "~n      Info:   ~p",
 2990: 					       [MRef, Sock, Info]),
 2991: 				   State2 = maps:remove(mon, State),
 2992: 				   State3 = maps:remove(sock, State2),
 2993: 				   {ok, State3}
 2994: 			   after 5000 ->
 2995: 				   ?SEV_EPRINT("socket down timeout"),
 2996: 				   {error, timeout}
 2997: 			   end
 2998:                    end},
 2999:          #{desc => "verify own number of monitors (=0)",

 3001: 			   0 = socket:number_of_monitors(self()),
 3002: 			   ok
 3003:                    end},

 3018:                                    ERROR
 3019:                            end
 3020:                    end},

 3402: 
 3403:     i("start client 1 evaluator"),
 3404:     Client1 = ?SEV_START("client-1", ClientSeq, InitState),
 3405: 
 3406:     i("start client 2 evaluator"),
 3407:     Client2 = ?SEV_START("client-2", ClientSeq, InitState),
 3408: 
 3409:     i("start client 3 evaluator"),
 3410:     Client3 = ?SEV_START("client-3", ClientSeq, InitState),
 3411: 
 3412:     i("start client 4 evaluator"),
 3413:     Client4 = ?SEV_START("client-4", ClientSeq, InitState),
 3414: 
 3415:     i("start client 5 evaluator"),
 3416:     Client5 = ?SEV_START("client-5", ClientSeq, InitState),
 3417: 
 3418:     i("start tester evaluator"),
 3419:     TesterInitState = #{owner   => Owner#ev.pid,
 3420: 			client1 => Client1#ev.pid,
 3421: 			client2 => Client2#ev.pid,
 3422: 			client3 => Client3#ev.pid,
 3423: 			client4 => Client4#ev.pid,
 3424: 			client5 => Client5#ev.pid},
 3425:     Tester = ?SEV_START("tester", TesterSeq, TesterInitState),
 3426: 
 3427:     i("await evaluator"),
 3428:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Owner, Tester]).
 3429: 
 3430: 
 3431: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 3432: %% Create one socket (by 'owner' process), monitor from several different
 3433: %% processes, then close socket (from 'owner').
 3434: %% The processes that did the monitor shall receive a socket DOWN.
 3435: 
 3436: monitor_open_and_exit_multi_mon(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 3437:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
 3438:     tc_try(monitor_open_and_exit_multi_mon,
 3439:            fun() ->
 3440: 		   InitState = #{domain   => inet,
 3441:                                  type     => stream,
 3442:                                  protocol => tcp},
 3443:                    ok = mon_open_and_exit_multi_mon(InitState)
 3444:            end).
 3445: 
 3446: 
 3447: mon_open_and_exit_multi_mon(InitState) ->
 3448:     OwnerSeq =
 3449:         [
 3450:          %% *** Wait for start order part ***
 3451:          #{desc => "await start (from tester)",
 3452:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
 3453:                            Tester = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
 3454:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester}}
 3455:                    end},
 3456:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
 3457:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
 3458:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
 3459:                            ok
 3460:                    end},
 3461: 
 3462:          %% *** Init part ***
 3463:          #{desc => "create socket",
 3464:            cmd  => fun(#{domain   := Domain, 
 3465:                          type     := Type, 
 3466:                          protocol := Proto} = State) ->
 3467:                            case socket:open(Domain, Type, Proto) of
 3468:                                {ok, Sock} ->
 3469:                                    {ok, State#{sock => Sock}};
 3470:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 3471:                                    ERROR
 3472:                            end
 3473:                    end},
 3474:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
 3475:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester, sock := Sock} = _State) ->
 3476:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init, Sock),
 3477:                            ok
 3478:                    end},
 3479: 
 3480:          %% The actual test
 3481:          #{desc => "await terminate (from tester)",
 3482:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
 3483:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
 3484:                                ok ->
 3485:                                    {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
 3486:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 3487:                                    ERROR
 3488:                            end
 3489:                    end},
 3490: 
 3491:          %% *** We are done ***
 3492:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 3493:         ],
 3494: 
 3495: 
 3496:     ClientSeq =
 3497:         [
 3498:          %% *** Wait for start order part ***
 3499:          #{desc => "await start (from tester)",
 3500:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
 3501:                            Tester = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
 3502:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester}}
 3503:                    end},
 3504:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
 3505:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
 3506:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
 3507:                            ok
 3508:                    end},
 3509: 
 3510:          %% *** Init part ***
 3511:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
 3512:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
 3513:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init),
 3514:                            ok
 3515:                    end},
 3516:          #{desc => "await continue (socket)",
 3517:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
 3518:                            {ok, Sock} =
 3519: 			       ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, socket),
 3520: 			   ?SEV_IPRINT("Socket: ~p", [Sock]),
 3521: 			   {ok, State#{sock => Sock}}
 3522:                    end},
 3523: 
 3524: 
 3525:          %% The actual test
 3526:          #{desc => "await continue (monitor)",
 3527:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 3528:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, monitor)
 3529:                    end},
 3530:          #{desc => "verify own number of monitors (=0)",
 3531:            cmd  => fun(_State) ->
 3532: 			   0 = socket:number_of_monitors(self()),
 3533: 			   ok
 3534:                    end},
 3535:          #{desc => "monitor socket",
 3536:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = State) ->
 3537:                            MRef = socket:monitor(Sock),
 3538: 			   ?SEV_IPRINT("Monitor: ~p", [MRef]),
 3539: 			   {ok, State#{mon => MRef}}
 3540:                    end},
 3541:          #{desc => "verify own number of monitors (=1)",
 3542:            cmd  => fun(_State) ->
 3543: 			   1 = socket:number_of_monitors(self()),
 3544: 			   ok
 3545:                    end},
 3546: 
 3547:          #{desc => "announce ready (monitor)",
 3548:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 3549:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, monitor),
 3550:                            ok
 3551:                    end},
 3552: 
 3553:          #{desc => "await continue (down)",
 3554:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 3555:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, down)
 3556:                    end},
 3557: 
 3558:          #{desc => "await socket down",
 3559:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock,
 3560: 			 mon  := MRef} = State) ->
 3561: 			   receive
 3562: 			       {'DOWN', MRef, socket, Sock, Info} ->
 3563: 				   ?SEV_IPRINT("received expected down: "
 3564: 					       "~n      MRef:   ~p"
 3565: 					       "~n      Socket: ~p"
 3566: 					       "~n      Info:   ~p",
 3567: 					       [MRef, Sock, Info]),
 3568: 				   State2 = maps:remove(mon, State),
 3569: 				   State3 = maps:remove(sock, State2),
 3570: 				   {ok, State3}
 3571: 			   after 5000 ->
 3572: 				   ?SEV_EPRINT("socket down timeout"),
 3573: 				   {error, timeout}
 3574: 			   end
 3575:                    end},
 3576:          #{desc => "verify own number of monitors (=0)",
 3577:            cmd  => fun(_State) ->
 3578: 			   0 = socket:number_of_monitors(self()),
 3579: 			   ok
 3580:                    end},
 3581: 
 3582:          #{desc => "announce ready (down)",
 3583:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 3584:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, down),
 3585:                            ok
 3586:                    end},
 3587: 
 3588: 
 3589:          #{desc => "await terminate (from tester)",
 3590:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
 3591:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
 3592:                                ok ->
 3593:                                    {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
 3594:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 3595:                                    ERROR
 3596:                            end
 3597:                    end},
 3598: 
 3599:          %% *** We are done ***
 3600:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 3601:         ],
 3602: 
 3603:     TesterSeq =
 3604:         [
 3605:          %% *** Init part ***
 3606:          #{desc => "monitor 'owner'",
 3607:            cmd  => fun(#{owner := Owner} = _State) ->
 3608:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Owner),
 3609:                            ok
 3610:                    end},
 3611:          #{desc => "order (owner) start",
 3612:            cmd  => fun(#{owner := Pid} = _State) ->
 3613:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid),
 3614:                            ok
 3615:                    end},
 3616:          #{desc => "await (owner) ready",
 3617:            cmd  => fun(#{owner := Pid} = State) ->
 3618:                            {ok, Sock} = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, owner, init),
 3619:                            {ok, State#{sock => Sock}}
 3620:                    end},
 3621: 
 3622:          #{desc => "monitor 'client 1'",
 3623:            cmd  => fun(#{client1 := Pid} = _State) ->
 3624:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
 3625:                            ok
 3626:                    end},
 3627:          #{desc => "order (client 1) start",
 3628:            cmd  => fun(#{client1 := Pid} = _State) ->
 3629:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid),
 3630:                            ok
 3631:                    end},
 3632:          #{desc => "await (client 1) ready",
 3633:            cmd  => fun(#{client1 := Pid} = _State) ->
 3634:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client1, init)
 3635:                    end},
 3636:          #{desc => "send socket to client 1",
 3637:            cmd  => fun(#{client1 := Pid, sock := Sock} = _State) ->
 3638:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, socket, Sock),
 3639:                            ok
 3640:                    end},
 3641: 
 3642:          #{desc => "monitor 'client 2'",
 3643:            cmd  => fun(#{client2 := Pid} = _State) ->
 3644:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
 3645:                            ok
 3646:                    end},
 3647:          #{desc => "order (client 2) start",
 3648:            cmd  => fun(#{client2 := Pid} = _State) ->
 3649:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid),
 3650:                            ok
 3651:                    end},

 3654:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client2, init)

 3951:         ],
 3952: 
 3953:     i("start (socket) owner evaluator"),
 3954:     Owner = ?SEV_START("owner", OwnerSeq, InitState),
 3955: 
 3956:     i("start client 1 evaluator"),
 3957:     Client1 = ?SEV_START("client-1", ClientSeq, InitState),
 3958: 
 3959:     i("start client 2 evaluator"),
 3960:     Client2 = ?SEV_START("client-2", ClientSeq, InitState),
 3961: 
 3962:     i("start client 3 evaluator"),
 3963:     Client3 = ?SEV_START("client-3", ClientSeq, InitState),
 3964: 
 3965:     i("start client 4 evaluator"),
 3966:     Client4 = ?SEV_START("client-4", ClientSeq, InitState),
 3967: 
 3968:     i("start client 5 evaluator"),
 3969:     Client5 = ?SEV_START("client-5", ClientSeq, InitState),
 3970: 
 3971:     i("start tester evaluator"),
 3972:     TesterInitState = #{owner   => Owner#ev.pid,
 3973: 			client1 => Client1#ev.pid,
 3974: 			client2 => Client2#ev.pid,
 3975: 			client3 => Client3#ev.pid,
 3976: 			client4 => Client4#ev.pid,
 3977: 			client5 => Client5#ev.pid},
 3978:     Tester = ?SEV_START("tester", TesterSeq, TesterInitState),
 3979: 
 3980:     i("await evaluator"),
 3981:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Owner, Tester]).
 3982: 
 3983: 
 3984: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 3985: %% Create several sockets (by 'owner' process), monitor each from several
 3986: %% different processes, then close each socket (from 'owner').
 3987: %% The processes that did the monitor shall receive one socket DOWN for
 3988: %% each socket.
 3989: 
 3990: monitor_open_and_close_multi_socks_and_mon(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3991:     ?TT(?SECS(30)),
 3992:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
 3993:            fun() ->
 3994:                    FactorKey = kernel_factor,
 3995:                    case lists:keysearch(FactorKey, 1, Config) of
 3996:                        {value, {FactorKey, Factor}} when (Factor > 15) ->
 3997:                            skip("Very slow machine");
 3998:                        _ ->
 3999:                            ok
 4000:                    end
 4001:            end,
 4002:            fun() ->
 4003: 		   InitState = #{domain   => inet,
 4004:                                  type     => stream,
 4005:                                  protocol => tcp},
 4006:                    ok = mon_open_and_close_multi_socks_and_mon(InitState)
 4007:            end).
 4008: 
 4009: 
 4010: mon_open_and_close_multi_socks_and_mon(InitState) ->
 4011:     OwnerSeq =
 4012:         [
 4013:          %% *** Wait for start order part ***
 4014:          #{desc => "await start (from tester)",
 4015:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
 4016:                            Tester = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
 4017:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester}}
 4018:                    end},
 4019:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
 4020:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
 4021:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
 4022:                            ok
 4023:                    end},
 4024: 
 4025:          %% *** Init part ***
 4026:          #{desc => "create socket 1",
 4027:            cmd  => fun(#{domain   := Domain, 
 4028:                          type     := Type, 
 4029:                          protocol := Proto} = State) ->
 4030:                            case socket:open(Domain, Type, Proto) of
 4031:                                {ok, Sock} ->
 4032:                                    {ok, State#{sock1 => Sock}};
 4033:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 4034:                                    ERROR
 4035:                            end
 4036:                    end},
 4037:          #{desc => "create socket 2",
 4038:            cmd  => fun(#{domain   := Domain, 
 4039:                          type     := Type, 
 4040:                          protocol := Proto} = State) ->
 4041:                            case socket:open(Domain, Type, Proto) of
 4042:                                {ok, Sock} ->
 4043:                                    {ok, State#{sock2 => Sock}};
 4044:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 4045:                                    ERROR
 4046:                            end
 4047:                    end},
 4048:          #{desc => "create socket 3",
 4049:            cmd  => fun(#{domain   := Domain, 
 4050:                          type     := Type, 
 4051:                          protocol := Proto} = State) ->
 4052:                            case socket:open(Domain, Type, Proto) of
 4053:                                {ok, Sock} ->
 4054:                                    {ok, State#{sock3 => Sock}};
 4055:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 4056:                                    ERROR
 4057:                            end
 4058:                    end},
 4059:          #{desc => "create socket 4",
 4060:            cmd  => fun(#{domain   := Domain, 
 4061:                          type     := Type, 
 4062:                          protocol := Proto} = State) ->
 4063:                            case socket:open(Domain, Type, Proto) of
 4064:                                {ok, Sock} ->
 4065:                                    {ok, State#{sock4 => Sock}};
 4066:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 4067:                                    ERROR
 4068:                            end
 4069:                    end},
 4070:          #{desc => "create socket 5",
 4071:            cmd  => fun(#{domain   := Domain, 
 4072:                          type     := Type, 
 4073:                          protocol := Proto} = State) ->
 4074:                            case socket:open(Domain, Type, Proto) of
 4075:                                {ok, Sock} ->
 4076:                                    {ok, State#{sock5 => Sock}};
 4077:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 4078:                                    ERROR
 4079:                            end
 4080:                    end},
 4081:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
 4082:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester,
 4083: 			 sock1  := Sock1,
 4084: 			 sock2  := Sock2,
 4085: 			 sock3  := Sock3,
 4086: 			 sock4  := Sock4,
 4087: 			 sock5  := Sock5} = _State) ->
 4088: 			   Socks = [Sock1, Sock2, Sock3, Sock4, Sock5],
 4089:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init, Socks),
 4090:                            ok
 4091:                    end},
 4092: 
 4093:          %% The actual test
 4094:          #{desc => "await continue (close1)",
 4095:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 4096:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, close1)
 4097:                    end},
 4098:          #{desc => "close socket 1",
 4099:            cmd  => fun(#{sock1 := Sock} = State) ->
 4100:                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
 4101: 			   {ok, maps:remove(sock1, State)}
 4102:                    end},
 4103: 
 4104:          #{desc => "await continue (close2)",
 4105:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 4106:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, close2)
 4107:                    end},
 4108:          #{desc => "close socket 2",
 4109:            cmd  => fun(#{sock2 := Sock} = State) ->
 4110:                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
 4111: 			   {ok, maps:remove(sock2, State)}
 4112:                    end},
 4113: 
 4114:          #{desc => "await continue (close3)",
 4115:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 4116:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, close3)
 4117:                    end},
 4118:          #{desc => "close socket 3",
 4119:            cmd  => fun(#{sock3 := Sock} = State) ->
 4120:                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
 4121: 			   {ok, maps:remove(sock3, State)}
 4122:                    end},
 4123: 
 4124:          #{desc => "await continue (close4)",
 4125:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 4126:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, close4)
 4127:                    end},
 4128:          #{desc => "close socket 4",
 4129:            cmd  => fun(#{sock4 := Sock} = State) ->
 4130:                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
 4131: 			   {ok, maps:remove(sock4, State)}
 4132:                    end},
 4133: 
 4134:          #{desc => "await continue (close5)",
 4135:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 4136:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, close5)
 4137:                    end},
 4138:          #{desc => "close socket 5",
 4139:            cmd  => fun(#{sock5 := Sock} = State) ->
 4140:                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
 4141: 			   {ok, maps:remove(sock5, State)}
 4142:                    end},
 4143: 
 4144: 
 4145:          #{desc => "await terminate (from tester)",
 4146:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
 4147:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
 4148:                                ok ->
 4149:                                    {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
 4150:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 4151:                                    ERROR
 4152:                            end
 4153:                    end},
 4154: 
 4155:          %% *** We are done ***
 4156:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 4157:         ],
 4158: 
 4159: 
 4160:     ClientSeq =
 4161:         [
 4162:          %% *** Wait for start order part ***
 4163:          #{desc => "await start (from tester)",
 4164:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
 4165:                            Tester = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
 4166:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester}}
 4167:                    end},
 4168:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
 4169:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
 4170:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
 4171:                            ok
 4172:                    end},
 4173: 
 4174:          %% *** Init part ***
 4175:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
 4176:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
 4177:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init),
 4178:                            ok
 4179:                    end},
 4180:          #{desc => "await continue (socket)",
 4181:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
 4182:                            {ok, [Sock1, Sock2, Sock3, Sock4, Sock5]} =
 4183: 			       ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, socket),
 4184: 			   ?SEV_IPRINT("Sockets: "
 4185: 				       "~n   1: ~p"
 4186: 				       "~n   2: ~p"
 4187: 				       "~n   3: ~p"
 4188: 				       "~n   4: ~p"
 4189: 				       "~n   5: ~p",
 4190: 				       [Sock1, Sock2, Sock3, Sock4, Sock5]),
 4191: 			   {ok, State#{sock1 => Sock1,
 4192: 				       sock2 => Sock2,
 4193: 				       sock3 => Sock3,
 4194: 				       sock4 => Sock4,
 4195: 				       sock5 => Sock5}}
 4196:                    end},
 4197: 
 4198: 
 4199:          %% The actual test
 4200:          #{desc => "await continue (monitor)",
 4201:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 4202:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, monitor)
 4203:                    end},
 4204: 
 4205:          #{desc => "verify own number of monitors (=0)",
 4206:            cmd  => fun(_State) ->
 4207: 			   0 = socket:number_of_monitors(self()),
 4208: 			   ok
 4209:                    end},
 4210:          #{desc => "monitor socket",
 4211:            cmd  => fun(#{sock1 := Sock1,
 4212: 			 sock2 := Sock2,
 4213: 			 sock3 := Sock3,
 4214: 			 sock4 := Sock4,
 4215: 			 sock5 := Sock5} = State) ->
 4216:                            MRef1 = socket:monitor(Sock1),
 4217:                            MRef2 = socket:monitor(Sock2),
 4218:                            MRef3 = socket:monitor(Sock3),
 4219:                            MRef4 = socket:monitor(Sock4),
 4220:                            MRef5 = socket:monitor(Sock5),
 4221: 			   ?SEV_IPRINT("Monitors: "
 4222: 				       "~n   1: ~p"
 4223: 				       "~n   2: ~p"
 4224: 				       "~n   3: ~p"
 4225: 				       "~n   4: ~p"
 4226: 				       "~n   5: ~p",
 4227: 				       [MRef1, MRef2, MRef3, MRef4, MRef5]),
 4228: 			   {ok, State#{mon1 => MRef1,
 4229: 				       mon2 => MRef2,
 4230: 				       mon3 => MRef3,
 4231: 				       mon4 => MRef4,
 4232: 				       mon5 => MRef5}}
 4233:                    end},
 4234:          #{desc => "verify own number of monitors (=5)",
 4235:            cmd  => fun(_State) ->
 4236: 			   5 = socket:number_of_monitors(self()),
 4237: 			   ok
 4238:                    end},
 4239: 
 4240:          #{desc => "announce ready (monitor)",
 4241:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 4242:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, monitor),
 4243:                            ok
 4244:                    end},
 4245: 
 4246:          #{desc => "await continue (down)",
 4247:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 4248:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, down)
 4249:                    end},
 4250: 
 4251:          #{desc => "await socket 1 down",
 4252:            cmd  => fun(#{sock1 := Sock,
 4253: 			 mon1  := MRef} = State) ->
 4254: 			   receive
 4255: 			       {'DOWN', MRef, socket, Sock, Info} ->
 4256: 				   ?SEV_IPRINT("received expected down: "
 4257: 					       "~n      MRef:   ~p"
 4258: 					       "~n      Socket: ~p"
 4259: 					       "~n      Info:   ~p",
 4260: 					       [MRef, Sock, Info]),
 4261: 				   State2 = maps:remove(mon1, State),
 4262: 				   State3 = maps:remove(sock1, State2),
 4263: 				   {ok, State3}
 4264: 			   after 5000 ->
 4265: 				   ?SEV_EPRINT("socket down timeout"),
 4266: 				   {error, timeout}
 4267: 			   end
 4268:                    end},
 4269:          #{desc => "announce ready (down)",
 4270:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 4271:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, down),
 4272:                            ok
 4273:                    end},
 4274: 
 4275:          #{desc => "await socket 2 down",
 4276:            cmd  => fun(#{sock2 := Sock,
 4277: 			 mon2  := MRef} = State) ->
 4278: 			   receive
 4279: 			       {'DOWN', MRef, socket, Sock, Info} ->
 4280: 				   ?SEV_IPRINT("received expected down: "
 4281: 					       "~n      MRef:   ~p"
 4282: 					       "~n      Socket: ~p"
 4283: 					       "~n      Info:   ~p",
 4284: 					       [MRef, Sock, Info]),
 4285: 				   State2 = maps:remove(mon2, State),
 4286: 				   State3 = maps:remove(sock2, State2),
 4287: 				   {ok, State3}
 4288: 			   after 5000 ->
 4289: 				   ?SEV_EPRINT("socket down timeout"),
 4290: 				   {error, timeout}
 4291: 			   end
 4292:                    end},
 4293:          #{desc => "announce ready (down)",
 4294:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 4295:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, down),
 4296:                            ok
 4297:                    end},
 4298: 
 4299:          #{desc => "await socket 3 down",
 4300:            cmd  => fun(#{sock3 := Sock,
 4301: 			 mon3  := MRef} = State) ->
 4302: 			   receive
 4303: 			       {'DOWN', MRef, socket, Sock, Info} ->
 4304: 				   ?SEV_IPRINT("received expected down: "
 4305: 					       "~n      MRef:   ~p"
 4306: 					       "~n      Socket: ~p"
 4307: 					       "~n      Info:   ~p",
 4308: 					       [MRef, Sock, Info]),
 4309: 				   State2 = maps:remove(mon3, State),
 4310: 				   State3 = maps:remove(sock3, State2),
 4311: 				   {ok, State3}
 4312: 			   after 5000 ->
 4313: 				   ?SEV_EPRINT("socket down timeout"),
 4314: 				   {error, timeout}
 4315: 			   end
 4316:                    end},
 4317:          #{desc => "announce ready (down)",
 4318:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 4319:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, down),
 4320:                            ok
 4321:                    end},
 4322: 
 4323:          #{desc => "await socket 4 down",
 4324:            cmd  => fun(#{sock4 := Sock,
 4325: 			 mon4  := MRef} = State) ->
 4326: 			   receive
 4327: 			       {'DOWN', MRef, socket, Sock, Info} ->
 4328: 				   ?SEV_IPRINT("received expected down: "
 4329: 					       "~n      MRef:   ~p"
 4330: 					       "~n      Socket: ~p"
 4331: 					       "~n      Info:   ~p",
 4332: 					       [MRef, Sock, Info]),
 4333: 				   State2 = maps:remove(mon4, State),
 4334: 				   State3 = maps:remove(sock4, State2),
 4335: 				   {ok, State3}
 4336: 			   after 5000 ->
 4337: 				   ?SEV_EPRINT("socket down timeout"),
 4338: 				   {error, timeout}
 4339: 			   end
 4340:                    end},
 4341:          #{desc => "announce ready (down)",
 4342:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 4343:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, down),
 4344:                            ok
 4345:                    end},
 4346: 
 4347:          #{desc => "await socket 5 down",
 4348:            cmd  => fun(#{sock5 := Sock,
 4349: 			 mon5  := MRef} = State) ->
 4350: 			   receive
 4351: 			       {'DOWN', MRef, socket, Sock, Info} ->
 4352: 				   ?SEV_IPRINT("received expected down: "
 4353: 					       "~n      MRef:   ~p"
 4354: 					       "~n      Socket: ~p"
 4355: 					       "~n      Info:   ~p",
 4356: 					       [MRef, Sock, Info]),
 4357: 				   State2 = maps:remove(mon5, State),
 4358: 				   State3 = maps:remove(sock5, State2),
 4359: 				   {ok, State3}
 4360: 			   after 5000 ->
 4361: 				   ?SEV_EPRINT("socket down timeout"),
 4362: 				   {error, timeout}
 4363: 			   end
 4364:                    end},
 4365:          #{desc => "announce ready (down)",
 4366:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 4367:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, down),
 4368:                            ok
 4369:                    end},
 4370:          #{desc => "verify own number of monitors (=0)",
 4371:            cmd  => fun(_State) ->
 4372: 			   0 = socket:number_of_monitors(self()),
 4373: 			   ok
 4374:                    end},
 4375: 
 4376: 
 4377:          #{desc => "await terminate (from tester)",
 4378:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
 4379:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
 4380:                                ok ->
 4381:                                    {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
 4382:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 4383:                                    ERROR
 4384:                            end
 4385:                    end},
 4386: 
 4387:          %% *** We are done ***
 4388:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 4389:         ],
 4390: 
 4391:     TesterSeq =
 4392:         [
 4393:          %% *** Init part ***
 4394:          #{desc => "monitor 'owner'",
 4395:            cmd  => fun(#{owner := Owner} = _State) ->
 4396:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Owner),
 4397:                            ok
 4398:                    end},
 4399:          #{desc => "order (owner) start",
 4400:            cmd  => fun(#{owner := Pid} = _State) ->
 4401:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid),
 4402:                            ok
 4403:                    end},
 4404:          #{desc => "await (owner) ready",
 4405:            cmd  => fun(#{owner := Pid} = State) ->
 4406:                            {ok, [Sock1, Sock2, Sock3, Sock4, Sock5]} =
 4407: 			       ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, owner, init),
 4408:                            {ok, State#{sock1 => Sock1,
 4409: 				       sock2 => Sock2,
 4410: 				       sock3 => Sock3,
 4411: 				       sock4 => Sock4,
 4412: 				       sock5 => Sock5}}
 4413:                    end},
 4414: 
 4415:          #{desc => "monitor 'client 1'",
 4416:            cmd  => fun(#{client1 := Pid} = _State) ->
 4417:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
 4418:                            ok
 4419:                    end},
 4420:          #{desc => "order (client 1) start",
 4421:            cmd  => fun(#{client1 := Pid} = _State) ->
 4422:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid),
 4423:                            ok
 4424:                    end},
 4425:          #{desc => "await (client 1) ready",
 4426:            cmd  => fun(#{client1 := Pid} = _State) ->
 4427:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client1, init)
 4428:                    end},
 4429:          #{desc => "send socket to client 1",
 4430:            cmd  => fun(#{client1 := Pid,
 4431: 			 sock1   := Sock1,
 4432: 			 sock2   := Sock2,
 4433: 			 sock3   := Sock3,
 4434: 			 sock4   := Sock4,
 4435: 			 sock5   := Sock5} = _State) ->
 4436: 			   Socks = [Sock1, Sock2, Sock3, Sock4, Sock5],
 4437:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, socket, Socks),
 4438:                            ok
 4439:                    end},
 4440: 
 4441:          #{desc => "monitor 'client 2'",
 4442:            cmd  => fun(#{client2 := Pid} = _State) ->
 4443:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
 4444:                            ok
 4445:                    end},
 4446:          #{desc => "order (client 2) start",
 4447:            cmd  => fun(#{client2 := Pid} = _State) ->
 4448:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid),
 4449:                            ok
 4450:                    end},
 4451:          #{desc => "await (client 2) ready",
 4452:            cmd  => fun(#{client2 := Pid} = _State) ->
 4453:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client2, init)
 4454:                    end},
 4455:          #{desc => "send socket to client 2",
 4456:            cmd  => fun(#{client2 := Pid,
 4457: 			 sock1   := Sock1,
 4458: 			 sock2   := Sock2,
 4459: 			 sock3   := Sock3,
 4460: 			 sock4   := Sock4,
 4461: 			 sock5   := Sock5} = _State) ->
 4462: 			   Socks = [Sock1, Sock2, Sock3, Sock4, Sock5],
 4463:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, socket, Socks),
 4464:                            ok
 4465:                    end},
 4466: 
 4467:          #{desc => "monitor 'client 3'",
 4468:            cmd  => fun(#{client3 := Pid} = _State) ->
 4469:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
 4470:                            ok
 4471:                    end},
 4472:          #{desc => "order (client 3) start",
 4473:            cmd  => fun(#{client3 := Pid} = _State) ->
 4474:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid),
 4475:                            ok
 4476:                    end},
 4477:          #{desc => "await (client 3) ready",
 4478:            cmd  => fun(#{client3 := Pid} = _State) ->
 4479:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client3, init)
 4480:                    end},
 4481:          #{desc => "send socket to client 3",
 4482:            cmd  => fun(#{client3 := Pid,
 4483: 			 sock1   := Sock1,
 4484: 			 sock2   := Sock2,
 4485: 			 sock3   := Sock3,
 4486: 			 sock4   := Sock4,
 4487: 			 sock5   := Sock5} = _State) ->
 4488: 			   Socks = [Sock1, Sock2, Sock3, Sock4, Sock5],
 4489:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, socket, Socks),
 4490:                            ok
 4491:                    end},
 4492: 
 4493:          #{desc => "monitor 'client 4'",
 4494:            cmd  => fun(#{client4 := Pid} = _State) ->
 4495:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
 4496:                            ok
 4497:                    end},
 4498:          #{desc => "order (client 4) start",
 4499:            cmd  => fun(#{client4 := Pid} = _State) ->
 4500:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid),
 4501:                            ok
 4502:                    end},
 4503:          #{desc => "await (client 4) ready",
 4504:            cmd  => fun(#{client4 := Pid} = _State) ->
 4505:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client4, init)
 4506:                    end},
 4507:          #{desc => "send socket to client 4",
 4508:            cmd  => fun(#{client4 := Pid,
 4509: 			 sock1   := Sock1,
 4510: 			 sock2   := Sock2,
 4511: 			 sock3   := Sock3,
 4512: 			 sock4   := Sock4,
 4513: 			 sock5   := Sock5} = _State) ->
 4514: 			   Socks = [Sock1, Sock2, Sock3, Sock4, Sock5],
 4515:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, socket, Socks),
 4516:                            ok
 4517:                    end},
 4518:

 4521:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
 4522:                            ok
 4523:                    end},

 4532:                    end},

 4540: 			   Socks = [Sock1, Sock2, Sock3, Sock4, Sock5],
 4541:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, socket, Socks),
 4542:                            ok
 4543:                    end},

 4825:                            ok
 4826:                    end},

 4828:            cmd  => fun(#{owner := Pid} = State) ->
 4829:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Pid) of
 4830:                                ok ->
 4831:                                    {ok, maps:remove(owner, State)};
 4832:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 4833:                                    ERROR
 4834:                            end
 4835:                    end},
 4836:

 4840:                            ok
 4841:                    end},

 4843:            cmd  => fun(#{client1 := Pid} = State) ->
 4844:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Pid) of
 4845:                                ok ->
 4846:                                    {ok, maps:remove(client1, State)};
 4847:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 4848:                                    ERROR
 4849:                            end
 4850:                    end},

 4856:                    end},

 4879:                            end
 4880:                    end},
 4881: 
 4882:          #{desc => "order (client 4) terminate",

 4885:                            ok
 4886:                    end},
 4887:          #{desc => "await (client 4) termination",
 4888:            cmd  => fun(#{client4 := Pid} = State) ->
 4889:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Pid) of
 4890:                                ok ->
 4891:                                    {ok, maps:remove(client4, State)};
 4892:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 4893:                                    ERROR
 4894:                            end
 4895:                    end},
 4896: 
 4897:          #{desc => "order (client 5) terminate",
 4898:            cmd  => fun(#{client5 := Pid} = _State) ->
 4899:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Pid),
 4900:                            ok
 4901:                    end},
 4902:          #{desc => "await (client 5) termination",
 4903:            cmd  => fun(#{client5 := Pid} = State) ->
 4904:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Pid) of
 4905:                                ok ->
 4906:                                    {ok, maps:remove(client5, State)};
 4907:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 4908:                                    ERROR
 4909:                            end
 4910:                    end},
 4911: 
 4912:          %% *** We are done ***
 4913:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 4914:         ],
 4915: 
 4916:     i("start (socket) owner evaluator"),
 4917:     Owner = ?SEV_START("owner", OwnerSeq, InitState),
 4918: 
 4919:     i("start client 1 evaluator"),
 4920:     Client1 = ?SEV_START("client-1", ClientSeq, InitState),
 4921: 
 4922:     i("start client 2 evaluator"),
 4923:     Client2 = ?SEV_START("client-2", ClientSeq, InitState),
 4924: 
 4925:     i("start client 3 evaluator"),
 4926:     Client3 = ?SEV_START("client-3", ClientSeq, InitState),
 4927: 
 4928:     i("start client 4 evaluator"),
 4929:     Client4 = ?SEV_START("client-4", ClientSeq, InitState),
 4930: 
 4931:     i("start client 5 evaluator"),
 4932:     Client5 = ?SEV_START("client-5", ClientSeq, InitState),
 4933: 
 4934:     i("start tester evaluator"),
 4935:     TesterInitState = #{owner   => Owner#ev.pid,
 4936: 			client1 => Client1#ev.pid,
 4937: 			client2 => Client2#ev.pid,
 4938: 			client3 => Client3#ev.pid,
 4939: 			client4 => Client4#ev.pid,
 4940: 			client5 => Client5#ev.pid},
 4941:     Tester = ?SEV_START("tester", TesterSeq, TesterInitState),
 4942: 
 4943:     i("await evaluator"),
 4944:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Owner, Tester]).
 4945: 
 4946: 
 4947: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 4948: %% Create several sockets (by 'owner' process), monitor each from several
 4949: %% different processes, then exit the owner.
 4950: %% The processes that did the monitor shall receive one socket DOWN for
 4951: %% each socket.
 4952: 
 4953: monitor_open_and_exit_multi_socks_and_mon(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4954:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
 4955:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
 4956:            fun() ->
 4957:                    FactorKey = kernel_factor,
 4958:                    case lists:keysearch(FactorKey, 1, Config) of
 4959:                        {value, {FactorKey, Factor}} when (Factor > 15) ->
 4960:                            skip("Very slow machine");
 4961:                        _ ->
 4962:                            ok
 4963:                    end
 4964:            end,
 4965:            fun() ->
 4966: 		   InitState = #{domain   => inet,
 4967:                                  type     => stream,
 4968:                                  protocol => tcp},
 4969:                    ok = mon_open_and_exit_multi_socks_and_mon(InitState)
 4970:            end).
 4971: 
 4972: 
 4973: mon_open_and_exit_multi_socks_and_mon(InitState) ->
 4974:     OwnerSeq =
 4975:         [
 4976:          %% *** Wait for start order part ***
 4977:          #{desc => "await start (from tester)",
 4978:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
 4979:                            Tester = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
 4980:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester}}
 4981:                    end},
 4982:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
 4983:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
 4984:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
 4985:                            ok
 4986:                    end},
 4987: 
 4988:          %% *** Init part ***
 4989:          #{desc => "create socket 1",
 4990:            cmd  => fun(#{domain   := Domain, 
 4991:                          type     := Type, 
 4992:                          protocol := Proto} = State) ->
 4993:                            case socket:open(Domain, Type, Proto) of
 4994:                                {ok, Sock} ->
 4995:                                    {ok, State#{sock1 => Sock}};
 4996:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 4997:                                    ERROR
 4998:                            end
 4999:                    end},
 5000:          #{desc => "create socket 2",
 5001:            cmd  => fun(#{domain   := Domain, 
 5002:                          type     := Type, 
 5003:                          protocol := Proto} = State) ->
 5004:                            case socket:open(Domain, Type, Proto) of
 5005:                                {ok, Sock} ->
 5006:                                    {ok, State#{sock2 => Sock}};
 5007:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 5008:                                    ERROR
 5009:                            end
 5010:                    end},
 5011:          #{desc => "create socket 3",
 5012:            cmd  => fun(#{domain   := Domain, 
 5013:                          type     := Type, 
 5014:                          protocol := Proto} = State) ->
 5015:                            case socket:open(Domain, Type, Proto) of
 5016:                                {ok, Sock} ->
 5017:                                    {ok, State#{sock3 => Sock}};
 5018:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 5019:                                    ERROR
 5020:                            end
 5021:                    end},
 5022:          #{desc => "create socket 4",
 5023:            cmd  => fun(#{domain   := Domain, 
 5024:                          type     := Type, 
 5025:                          protocol := Proto} = State) ->
 5026:                            case socket:open(Domain, Type, Proto) of
 5027:                                {ok, Sock} ->
 5028:                                    {ok, State#{sock4 => Sock}};
 5029:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 5030:                                    ERROR
 5031:                            end
 5032:                    end},
 5033:          #{desc => "create socket 5",
 5034:            cmd  => fun(#{domain   := Domain, 
 5035:                          type     := Type, 
 5036:                          protocol := Proto} = State) ->
 5037:                            case socket:open(Domain, Type, Proto) of
 5038:                                {ok, Sock} ->
 5039:                                    {ok, State#{sock5 => Sock}};
 5040:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 5041:                                    ERROR
 5042:                            end
 5043:                    end},
 5044:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
 5045:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester,
 5046: 			 sock1  := Sock1,
 5047: 			 sock2  := Sock2,
 5048: 			 sock3  := Sock3,
 5049: 			 sock4  := Sock4,
 5050: 			 sock5  := Sock5} = _State) ->
 5051: 			   Socks = [Sock1, Sock2, Sock3, Sock4, Sock5],
 5052:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init, Socks),
 5053:                            ok
 5054:                    end},
 5055: 
 5056:          %% The actual test
 5057:          #{desc => "await terminate (from tester)",
 5058:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
 5059:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
 5060:                                ok ->
 5061:                                    {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
 5062:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 5063:                                    ERROR
 5064:                            end
 5065:                    end},

 5547:          #{desc => "order (owner) terminate",
 5548:            cmd  => fun(#{owner := Pid} = _State) ->
 5549:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Pid),
 5550:                            ok
