11848: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
11849: 
11850: otp18240_accept_tcp(#{domain    := Domain,
11851:                       protocol  := Proto,
11852:                       num_socks := NumSocks}) ->
11853:     Self = self(),
11854:     {Pid, Mon} = spawn_monitor(fun() ->
11855:                                        otp18240_acceptor(Self,
11856:                                                          Domain, Proto,
11857:                                                          NumSocks)
11858:                                end),
11859:     otp18240_await_acceptor(Pid, Mon).
11860: 
11861: otp18240_await_acceptor(Pid, Mon) ->
11862:     receive
11863: 	{'DOWN', Mon, process, Pid, ok} ->
11864: 	    i("acceptor successfully terminated"),
11865:             ok;
11866: 	{'DOWN', Mon, process, Pid, {skip, _} = SKIP} ->
11867: 	    i("acceptor successfully terminated"),
11868:             exit(SKIP);
11869:         {'DOWN', Mon, process, Pid, Info} ->
11870:             i("acceptor unexpected termination: "
11871:               "~n   ~p", [Info]),
11872:             exit({unexpected_result, Info})
11873:     after 5000 ->
11874: 	    i("acceptor process (~p) info"
11875: 	      "~n   Refs: ~p"
11876: 	      "~n   Info: ~p",
11877: 	      [Pid, monitored_by(Pid), erlang:process_info(Pid)]),
11878: 	    otp18240_await_acceptor(Pid, Mon)
11879:     end.
11880: 
11881: otp18240_acceptor(Parent, Domain, Proto, NumSocks) ->
11882:     i("[acceptor] begin with: "
11883:       "~n   Parent:   ~p"
11884:       "~n   Domain:   ~p"
11885:       "~n   Protocol: ~p", [Parent, Domain, Proto]),
11886:     MonitoredBy0 = monitored_by(),
11887:     ?SLEEP(?SECS(5)),
11888:     Addr = case ?SLIB:which_local_host_info(Domain) of
11889:                {ok, #{addr := A}} ->
11890:                    A;
11891:                {error, Reason} ->
11892:                    exit({skip, Reason})
11893:            end,
11894:     {ok, LSock} = socket:open(Domain, stream, Proto,
11895:                               #{use_registry => false}),
11896:     ok = socket:bind(LSock, #{family => Domain, addr => Addr, port => 0}),
11897:     ok = socket:listen(LSock, NumSocks),
11898:     ?SLEEP(?SECS(5)),
11899:     MonitoredBy1 = monitored_by(),
11900:     i("[acceptor]: listen socket created"
11901:       "~n   'Montored By' before listen socket: ~p"
11902:       "~n   'Montored By' after listen socket:  ~p",
11903:       [MonitoredBy0, MonitoredBy1]),
11904: 
11905:     [LSockMon] = MonitoredBy1 -- MonitoredBy0,
11906: 
11907:     i("[acceptor]: "
11908:       "~n   Listen Socket Monitor: ~p"
11909:       "~n   Listen Socket info:    ~p",
11910:       [LSockMon, socket:info(LSock)]),
11911: 
11912:     {ok, #{port := Port}} = socket:sockname(LSock),
11913: 
11914:     i("[acceptor] create ~w clients (connectors)", [NumSocks]),
11915:     _Clients = [spawn_link(fun() ->
11916:                                    otp18240_client(CID,
11917:                                                    Domain, Proto,
11918:                                                    Addr, Port)
11919:                            end) || CID <- lists:seq(1, NumSocks)],
11920: 
11921:     i("[acceptor] accept ~w connections", [NumSocks]),
11922:     ServSocks = [otp18240_do_accept(AID, LSock) ||
11923:                     AID <- lists:seq(1, NumSocks)],
11924: 
11925:     i("[acceptor] close accepted connections when: "
11926:       "~n   Listen Socket info: ~p", [socket:info(LSock)]),
11927:     _ = [otp18240_do_close(S) || S <- ServSocks],
11928: 
11929:     %% at this point in time there should be no monitors from NIFs,
11930:     %% because we're not accepting anything
11931:     i("[acceptor] check monitor status"),
11932:     MonitoredBy2 = monitored_by(),
11933:     MonitoredBy3 = MonitoredBy2 -- [Parent, LSockMon],
11934:     i("[acceptor] monitor status: "
11935:       "~n   UnRefs:       ~p"
11936:       "~n   MonitoredBy2: ~p"
11937:       "~n   MonitoredBy3: ~p",
11938:       [[Parent, LSockMon], MonitoredBy2, MonitoredBy3]),
11939:     if
11940:         ([] =:= MonitoredBy3) ->
11941:             i("[acceptor] done"),
11942:             socket:close(LSock),
11943:             exit(ok);
11944:         true ->
11945:             socket:close(LSock),
11946:             i("[acceptor] Unexpected monitors: "
11947:               "~n   ~p", [MonitoredBy2]),
11948:             exit({unexpected_monitors, MonitoredBy2})
11949:     end.
11950: 
11951: 
11952: otp18240_client(ID, Domain, Proto, Addr, PortNo) ->
11953:     i("[connector ~w] try create connector socket", [ID]),
11954:     {ok, Sock} = socket:open(Domain, stream, Proto, #{use_registry => false}),
11955:     ok = socket:bind(Sock, #{family => Domain, addr => Addr, port => 0}),
11956:     %% ok = socket:setopt(Sock, otp, debug, true),
11957:     i("[connector ~w] try connect", [ID]),
11958:     case socket:connect(Sock,
11959:                         #{family => Domain, addr => Addr, port => PortNo}) of
11960:         ok ->
11961:             i("[connector ~w] connected - now try recv", [ID]),
11962:             case socket:recv(Sock) of
11963:                 {ok, Data} ->
11964:                     i("[connector ~w] received unexpected data: "
11965:                       "~n   ~p", [ID, Data]),
11966:                     (catch socket:close(Sock)),
11967:                     exit('unexpected data');
11968:                 {error, closed} ->
11969:                     i("[connector ~w] expected socket close", [ID]);
11970:                 {error, Reason} ->
11971:                     i("[connector ~w] unexpected error when reading: "
11972:                       "~n   ~p", [ID, Reason]),
11973:                     (catch socket:close(Sock))
11974:             end;
11975:         {error, {completion_status, #{info := invalid_netname = R} = Reason}} ->
11976:             i("[connector ~w] failed connecting: "
11977:               "~n   ~p", [ID, Reason]),
11978:             (catch socket:close(Sock)),
11979:             exit({skip, R});
11980:         {error, {completion_status, invalid_netname = Reason}} ->
11981:             i("[connector ~w] failed connecting: "
11982:               "~n   ~p", [ID, Reason]),
11983:             (catch socket:close(Sock)),
11984:             exit({skip, Reason});
11985:         {error, enetunreach = Reason} ->
11986:             i("[connector ~w] failed connecting: "
11987:               "~n   ~p", [ID, Reason]),
11988:             (catch socket:close(Sock)),
11989:             exit({skip, Reason});
11990: 
11991:         {error, Reason} ->
11992:             i("[connector ~w] failed connecting: "
11993:               "~n   ~p", [ID, Reason]),
11994:             (catch socket:close(Sock))
11995:     end,
11996:     i("[connector ~w] done", [ID]),
11997:     ok.
11998: 
11999: 
12000: otp18240_do_accept(ID, LSock) ->
12001:     i("[acceptor ~w] try accept", [ID]),
12002:     {ok, Sock} = socket:accept(LSock),
12003:     i("[acceptor ~w] accepted: ~p", [ID, Sock]),
12004:     {ID, Sock}.
12005: 
12006: 
12007: otp18240_do_close({ID, Sock}) ->
12008:     i("[acceptor ~w] try close ~p", [ID, Sock]),
12009:     case socket:close(Sock) of
12010: 	ok ->
12011: 	    i("[acceptor ~w] socket closed", [ID]),
12012: 	    ok;
12013: 	{error, Reason} ->
12014: 	    i("[acceptor ~w] failed close socket: "
12015: 	      "~n   ~p", [ID, Reason]),
12016: 	    error
12017:     end.
12018: 
12019: 
12020: 
12021: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
12022: 
12023: %% This test case is to verify that we do not leak monitors.
12024: otp18635(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
12025:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
12026:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
12027:            fun() ->
12028:                    is_not_windows(),
12029:                    has_support_ipv4()
12030:            end,
12031:            fun() ->
12032:                    InitState = #{},
12033:                    ok = do_otp18635(InitState)
12034:            end).
12035: 
12036: 
12037: do_otp18635(_) ->
12038:     Parent = self(),
12039: 
12040:     ?P("try create (listen) socket when"
12041:        "~n   (gen socket) info: ~p"
12042:        "~n   Sockets:           ~p",
12043:        [socket:info(), socket:which_sockets()]),
12044: 
12045:     ?P("Get \"proper\" local socket address"),
12046:     LSA = which_local_socket_addr(inet),
12047: 
12048:     {ok, LSock} = socket:open(inet, stream, #{use_registry => true}),
12049: 
12050:     ?P("bind (listen) socket to: "
12051:        "~n   ~p", [LSA]),
12052:     ok = socket:bind(LSock, LSA),
12053: 
12054:     ?P("make listen socket"),
12055:     ok = socket:listen(LSock),
12056: 
12057:     ?P("get sockname for listen socket"),
12058:     {ok, SA} = socket:sockname(LSock),
12059: 
12060:     %% ok = socket:setopt(LSock, otp, debug, true),
12061: 
12062:                                                 % show handle returned from nowait accept
12063:     ?P("try accept with timeout = nowait - expect select when"
12064:        "~n   (gen socket) info: ~p"
12065:        "~n   Sockets:           ~p",
12066:        [socket:info(), socket:which_sockets()]),
12067:     {select, {select_info, _, Handle}} = socket:accept(LSock, nowait),
12068:     ?P("expected select result: "
12069:        "~n   Select Handle:     ~p"
12070:        "~n   (gen socket) info: ~p"
12071:        "~n   Sockets:           ~p",
12072:        [Handle, socket:info(), socket:which_sockets()]),
12073: 
12074:     ?SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
12075: 
12076:     %% perform a blocking accept that will fail (timeout)
12077:     ?P("attempt accept with timeout = 500 - expect failure (timeout)"),
12078:     {error, timeout} = socket:accept(LSock, 500),
12079: 
12080:     ?P("await abort message for the first accept call: "
12081:        "~n   Select Handle:     ~p"
12082:        "~n   (gen socket) info: ~p"
12083:        "~n   Sockets:           ~p",
12084:        [Handle, socket:info(), socket:which_sockets()]),
12085:     receive
12086:         {'$socket', LSock, abort, {Handle, cancelled}} ->
12087:             ?P("received expected abort message"),
12088:             ok
12089:     end,
12090: 
12091:     %% spawn a client to connect
12092:     ?P("spawn connector when"
12093:        "~n   (gen socket) info:  ~p"
12094:        "~n   Listen Socket info: ~p"
12095:        "~n   Sockets:            ~p",
12096:        [socket:info(), socket:info(LSock), socket:which_sockets()]),
12097:     {Connector, MRef} =
12098:         spawn_monitor(
12099:           fun() ->
12100:                   ?P("[connector] try create socket"),
12101:                   {ok, CSock} = socket:open(inet, stream),
12102:                   ?P("[connector] try connect: "
12103:                      "~n   (server) ~p", [SA]),
12104:                   ok = socket:connect(CSock, SA),
12105:                   ?P("[connector] connected - inform parent"),
12106:                   Parent ! {self(), connected},
12107:                   ?P("[connector] await termination command"),
12108:                   receive
12109:                       {Parent, terminate} ->
12110:                           ?P("[connector] terminate - close socket"),
12111:                           (catch socket:close(CSock)),
12112:                           exit(normal)
12113:                   end
12114:           end),
12115: 
12116:     ?P("await (connection-) confirmation from connector (~p)", [Connector]),
12117:     receive
12118:         {Connector, connected} ->
12119:             ?P("connector connected"),
12120:             ok
12121:     end,
12122: 
12123:     %% We should *not* get *any* select messages;
12124:     %% since the second call (that *replaced* the current active request)
12125:     %% timeout out
12126:     ?P("wait for a select message that should never come"),
12127:     Result =
12128:         receive
12129:             {'$socket', LSock, select, AnyHandle} ->
12130:                 ?P("received unexpected select message when"
12131:                    "~n   Unexpected Handle:  ~p"
12132:                    "~n   (gen socket) info:  ~p"
12133:                    "~n   Listen Socket info: ~p"
12134:                    "~n   Sockets:            ~p",
12135:                    [AnyHandle,
12136:                     socket:info(), socket:info(LSock), socket:which_sockets()]),
12137:                 error
12138:         after 5000 ->
12139:                 ?P("expected timeout"),
12140:                 ok
12141:         end,
12142: 
12143:     ?P("try accept the waiting connection when"
12144:        "~n   (gen socket) info:  ~p"
12145:        "~n   Listen Socket info: ~p"
12146:        "~n   Sockets:            ~p",
12147:        [socket:info(), socket:info(LSock), socket:which_sockets()]),
12148: 
12149:     {ok, ASock} = socket:accept(LSock),
12150: 
12151:     ?P("connection accepted"
12152:        "~n   (gen socket) info:    ~p"
12153:        "~n   Accepted socket:      ~p"
12154:        "~n   Accepted Socket info: ~p"
12155:        "~n   Listen Socket info:   ~p"
12156:        "~n   Sockets:              ~p",
12157:        [socket:info(),
12158:         ASock,
12159:         socket:info(ASock),
12160:         socket:info(LSock),
12161:         socket:which_sockets()]),
12162: 
12163:     ?P("cleanup"),
12164:     socket:close(LSock),
12165:     socket:close(ASock),
12166:     Connector ! {self(), terminate},
12167:     receive
12168:         {'DOWN', MRef, process, Connector, _} ->
12169:             ?P("connector terminated"),
12170:             ok
12171:     end,
12172: 
12173:     ?SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
12174: 
12175:     ?P("done when"
12176:        "~n   (gen socket) info: ~p"
12177:        "~n   Sockets:           ~p", [socket:info(), socket:which_sockets()]),
12178: 
12179:     Result.
12180: 
12181: 
12182: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
12183: 
12184: %% This test case is to verify recv on UDP with timeout zero (0) on Windows.
12185: otp19063(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
12186:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
12187:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
12188:            fun() ->
12189:                    %% is_windows(),
12190:                    has_support_ipv4()
12191:            end,
12192:            fun() ->
12193:                    InitState = #{},
12194:                    ok = do_otp19063(InitState)
12195:            end).
12196: 
12197: 
12198: do_otp19063(_) ->
12199:     Parent = self(),
12200: 
12201:     ?P("Get \"proper\" local socket address"),
12202:     LSA0 = which_local_socket_addr(inet),
12203:     LSA  = LSA0#{port => 0},
12204:     
12205: 
12206: 
12207:     %% --- recv ---
12208: 
12209:     ?P("[recv] - create (listen) socket"),
12210:     {ok, LSock1} = socket:open(inet, stream),
12211: 
12212:     ?P("[recv] bind (listen) socket to: "
12213:        "~n   ~p", [LSA]),
12214:     ok = socket:bind(LSock1, LSA),
12215: 
12216:     ?P("[recv] make listen socket"),
12217:     ok = socket:listen(LSock1),
12218: 
12219:     ?P("[recv] get sockname for listen socket"),
12220:     {ok, SA1} = socket:sockname(LSock1),
12221: 
12222:     ?P("[recv] attempt a nowait-accept"),
12223:     {Tag, Handle} =
12224:         case socket:accept(LSock1, nowait) of
12225:             {select, {select_info, _, SH}} ->
12226:                 {select, SH};
12227:             {completion, {completion_info, _, CH}} ->
12228:                 {completion, CH}
12229:         end,
12230: 
12231:     ?P("[recv] spawn the connector process"),
12232:     {Connector, MRef} =
12233:         spawn_monitor(
12234:           fun() ->
12235:                   ?P("[connector] try create socket"),
12236:                   {ok, CSock1} = socket:open(inet, stream),
12237:                   ?P("[connector] bind socket to: "
12238:                      "~n   ~p", [LSA]),
12239:                   ok = socket:bind(CSock1, LSA),
12240:                   ?P("[connector] try connect: "
12241:                      "~n   (server) ~p", [SA1]),
12242:                   ok = socket:connect(CSock1, SA1),
12243:                   ?P("[connector] connected - inform parent"),
12244:                   Parent ! {self(), connected},
12245:                   ?P("[connector] await termination command"),
12246:                   receive
12247:                       {Parent, terminate} ->
12248:                           ?P("[connector] terminate - close socket"),
12249:                           (catch socket:close(CSock1)),
12250:                           exit(normal)
12251:                   end
12252:           end),
12253: 
12254:     ?P("[recv] await (connection-) confirmation from connector (~p)",
12255:        [Connector]),
12256:     receive
12257:         {Connector, connected} ->
12258:             ?P("[recv] connector connected"),
12259:             ok
12260:     end,
12261: 
12262:     ?P("[recv] receive the accepted socket"),
12263:     ASock1 =
12264:         receive
12265:             {'$socket', LSock1, completion, {Handle, {ok, AS}}}
12266:               when (Tag =:= completion) ->
12267:                 AS;
12268:             {'$socket', LSock1, completion, {Handle, {error, Reason1C}}}
12269:               when (Tag =:= completion) ->
12270:                 exit({accept_failed, Reason1C});
12271:            {'$socket', LSock1, select, Handle}  ->
12272:                 case socket:accept(LSock1, nowait) of
12273:                     {ok, AS} ->
12274:                         AS;
12275:                     {error, Reason1S} ->
12276:                         exit({accept_failed, Reason1S})
12277:                 end
12278:         end,
12279: 
12280:     ?SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
12281: 
12282:     ?P("[recv] try read"),
12283:     case socket:recv(ASock1, 0, 0) of
12284:         {error, timeout} ->
12285:             ok;
12286:         Any1             ->
12287:             ?P("Unexpected result: ~p", [Any1]),
12288:             exit({unexpected_recv_result, Any1})
12289:     end,
12290: 
12291: 
12292:     %% --- recvfrom ---
12293: 
12294:     ?P("[recvfrom} create socket"),
12295:     {ok, Sock2} = socket:open(inet, dgram),
12296: 
12297:     ?P("[recvfrom} bind socket to: "
12298:        "~n   ~p", [LSA]),
12299:     ok = socket:bind(Sock2, LSA),
12300: 
12301:     ?SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
12302: 
12303:     ?P("[recvfrom] try read"),
12304:     {error, timeout} = socket:recvfrom(Sock2, 1024, 0),
12305: 
12306: 
12307:     %% --- recvmsg ---
12308: 
12309:     ?P("[recvmsg] create socket"),
12310:     {ok, Sock3} = socket:open(inet, dgram),
12311: 
12312:     ?P("[recvmsg] bind socket to: "
12313:        "~n   ~p", [LSA]),
12314:     ok = socket:bind(Sock3, LSA),
12315: 
12316:     ?SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
12317: 
12318:     ?P("[recvmsg] try read"),
12319:     {error, timeout} = socket:recvmsg(Sock3, 0),
12320: 
12321: 
12322:     ?P("cleanup"),
12323: 
12324:     Connector ! {self(), terminate},
12325:     receive
12326:         {'DOWN', MRef, process, Connector, _} ->
12327:             ?P("connector terminated"),
12328:             ok
12329:     end,
12330:     _ = socket:close(ASock1),
12331:     _ = socket:close(LSock1),
12332:     _ = socket:close(Sock2),
12333:     _ = socket:close(Sock3),
12334: 
12335:     ?P("done"),
12336: 
12337:     ok.
12338: 
12339: 
12340: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
12341: 
12342: otp19251(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
12343:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
12344:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
12345:            fun() ->
12346:                    is_windows(),
12347:                    has_support_unix_domain_socket()
12348:            end,
12349:            fun() ->
12350:                    InitState = #{},
12351:                    ok = do_otp19251(InitState)
12352:            end).
12353: 
12354: 
12355: do_otp19251(_) ->
12356: 
12357:     %% Just be on the safe side
12358:     ?P("pre cleanup"),
12359:     file:delete("sock1"),
12360:     file:delete("sock2"),
12361: 
12362:     %% Create first socket
12363:     ?P("create (and bind) first socket"),
12364:     {ok, Sock1} = socket:open(local, stream),
12365:     ok          = socket:bind(Sock1,
12366:                               #{family => local,
12367:                                 path   => <<"sock1">>}),
12368: 
12369:     %% Attempt first invalid connect
12370:     ?P("try first invalid connect - expect failure"),
12371:     case socket:connect(Sock1, #{family => local, path => <<"none">>}) of
12372:         {error, econnrefused} ->
12373:             ?P("expected failure"),
12374:             ok;
12375:         %% {error, enoent} ->
12376:         %%     ?P("expected failure"),
12377:         %%     ok;
12378:         {error, #{info := econnrefused}} ->
12379:             ?P("expected failure"),
12380:             ok;
12381:         {error, #{info := Reason1} = EEI1} ->
12382:             ?P("unexpected failure reason: "
12383:                "~n   ~p", [EEI1]),
12384:             ?FAIL({unexpected_failure_reason, Reason1});
12385:         ok ->
12386:             ?FAIL(unexpected_success)
12387:     end,
12388: 
12389: 
12390:     %% Create second socket
12391:     ?P("create (and bind) second socket"),
12392:     {ok, Sock2} = socket:open(local, stream),
12393:     ok          = socket:bind(Sock2,
12394:                               #{family => local,
12395:                                 path   => <<"sock2">>}),
12396: 
12397:     %% Attempt second invalid connect
12398:     ?P("try first invalid connect - expect failure"),
12399:     case socket:connect(Sock2, #{family => local, path => <<"none">>}) of
12400:         {error, econnrefused} ->
12401:             ?P("expected failure"),
12402:             ok;
12403:         %% {error, enoent} ->
12404:         %%     ?P("expected failure"),
12405:         %%     ok;
12406:         {error, #{info := econnrefused}} ->
12407:             ?P("expected failure"),
12408:             ok;
12409:         {error, #{info := Reason2} = EEI2} ->
12410:             ?P("unexpected failure reason: "
12411:                "~n   ~p", [EEI2]),
12412:             ?FAIL({unexpected_failure_reason, Reason2});
12413:         ok ->
12414:             ?FAIL(unexpected_success)
12415:     end,
12416: 
12417:     %% And verify that we can still create more sockets:
12418:     ?P("create more sockets - expect success"),
12419:     {ok, Sock3} = socket:open(local, stream),
12420:     {ok, Sock4} = socket:open(local, stream),
12421: 
12422:     %% Cleanup
12423:     ?P("cleanup"),
12424:     _ = socket:close(Sock4),
12425:     _ = socket:close(Sock3),
12426:     _ = socket:close(Sock2),
12427:     _ = socket:close(Sock1),
12428: 
12429:     ?P("done"),
12430: 
12431:     ok.
12432: 
12433:

12435: 
12436: sock_open(Domain, Type, Proto) ->
12437:     try socket:open(Domain, Type, Proto) of
12438:         {ok, Socket} ->
12439:             Socket;
12440:         {error, Reason} ->
12441:             ?FAIL({open, Reason})
12442:     catch
12443:         C:E:S ->
12444:             ?FAIL({open, C, E, S})
12445:     end.
12446: 
12447: 
12448: sock_bind(Sock, LSA) ->
12449:     try socket:bind(Sock, LSA) of
12450:         ok = OK ->
12451:             OK;
12452:         {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
12453:             ?SEV_IPRINT("Address not available"),
12454:             throw({skip, Reason});
12455:         {error, _} = ERROR ->
12456:             ERROR
12457:     catch
12458:         C:E:S ->
12459:             ?FAIL({bind, C, E, S})
12460:     end.
12461: 
12462: %% sock_connect(Sock, SockAddr) ->
12463: %%     try socket:connect(Sock, SockAddr) of
12464: %%         ok ->
12465: %%             ok;
12466: %%         {error, Reason} ->
12467: %%             ?FAIL({connect, Reason})
12468: %%     catch
12469: %%         C:E:S ->
12470: %%             ?FAIL({connect, C, E, S})
12471: %%     end.
12472:     
12473: sock_port(S) ->
12474:     case socket:sockname(S) of
12475:         {ok, #{port := Port}} -> Port;
12476:         {ok, #{}}             -> undefined
12477:     end.
12478: 
12479: %% sock_sockname(Sock) ->
12480: %%     try socket:sockname(Sock) of
12481: %%         {ok, SockAddr} ->
12482: %%             SockAddr;
12483: %%         {error, Reason} ->
12484: %%             ?FAIL({sockname, Reason})
12485: %%     catch
12486: %%         C:E:S ->
12487: %%             ?FAIL({sockname, C, E, S})
12488: %%     end.
12489:     
12490: sock_close(Sock) ->
12491:     try socket:close(Sock) of
12492:         ok ->
12493:             ok;
12494:         {error, Reason} ->
12495:             i("sock_close -> error: ~p", [Reason]),
12496:             ?FAIL({close, Reason})
12497:     catch
12498:         C:E:S ->
12499:             i("sock_close -> failed: ~p, ~p, ~p", [C, E, S]),
12500:             ?FAIL({close, C, E, S})
12501:     end.
12502: 
12503: 
12504: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
12505: 
12506: local_host() ->
12507:     try net_adm:localhost() of
12508:         Host when is_list(Host) ->
12509: 	    %% Convert to shortname if long
12510: 	    case string:tokens(Host, [$.]) of
12511: 		[H|_] ->
12512: 		    list_to_atom(H)
12513: 	    end
12514:     catch
12515:         C:E:S ->
12516:             erlang:raise(C, E, S)
12517:     end.
12518: 
12519: 
12520: %% The point of this is to "ensure" that paths from different test runs
12521: %% don't clash.
12522: 
12523: mk_unique_path() ->
12524:     ?SLIB:mk_unique_path().
12525: 
12526: 
12527: which_local_socket_addr(local = Domain) ->
12528:     #{family => Domain,
12529:       path   => mk_unique_path()};
12530: 
12531: %% This gets the local socket address (not 127.0...)
12532: %% We should really implement this using the (new) net module,
12533: %% but until that gets the necessary functionality...
12534: which_local_socket_addr(Domain) ->
12535:     case ?KLIB:which_local_host_info(Domain) of
12536:         {ok, [#{addr := Addr}|_]} ->
12537:             #{family => Domain,
12538:               addr   => Addr};
12539:         {error, Reason} ->
12540:             ?FAIL(Reason)
12541:     end.
12542: 
12543: 
12544: which_local_addr(local = _Domain) ->
12545:     mk_unique_path();
12546: 
12547: %% This gets the local address (not 127.0...)
12548: %% We should really implement this using the (new) net module,
12549: %% but until that gets the necessary functionality...
12550: which_local_addr(Domain) ->
12551:     ?KLIB:which_local_addr(Domain).

12559:     {monitored_by, Refs} = erlang:process_info(Pid, monitored_by),
12560:     Refs.

12565: %% Here are all the *general* test case condition functions.
12566: 
12567: etc_issue() ->
12568:     string:trim(os:cmd("cat /etc/issue")).
12569: 
12570: is_old_fedora16() ->
12571:     is_old_fedora16( etc_issue() ).
12572: 
12573: %% We actually only have one host running this, a slow VM.
12574: is_old_fedora16("Fedora release 16 " ++ _) ->
12575:     skip("Very slow VM");
12576: is_old_fedora16(_) ->
12577:     ok.
12578: 
12579: is_not_windows() ->
12580:     case os:type() of
12581:         {win32, nt} ->
12582:             skip("This does not work on Windows");
12583:         _ ->
12584:             ok
12585:     end.
12586: 
12587: is_windows() ->
12588:     case os:type() of
12589:         {win32, nt} ->
12590:             ok;
12591:         _ ->
12592:             skip("Only test on Windows")
12593:     end.
12594: 
12595: 
12596: has_support_unix_domain_socket() ->
12597:     case socket:is_supported(local) of
12598: 	true ->
12599: 	    ok;
12600: 	false ->
12601: 	    skip("Not supported")
12602:     end.
12603: 
12604: has_support_sctp() ->
12605:     case os:type() of
12606:         {win32, _} ->
12607:             skip("Not supported");
12608:         {unix, netbsd} ->
12609:             %% XXX We will have to investigate this later...
12610:             skip("Not supported");
12611:         _ ->
12612:             case socket:is_supported(sctp) of
12613:                 true ->
12614:                     ok;
12615:                 false ->
12616:                     skip("Not supported")
12617:             end
12618:     end.
12619: 
12620: 
12621: %% The idea is that this function shall test if the host has 
12622: %% support for IPv4 or IPv6.
12623: %% If not, there is no point in running corresponding tests.
12624: %% Currently we just skip.
12625: has_support_ipv4() ->
12626:     ?KLIB:has_support_ipv4().
12627: 
12628: has_support_ipv6() ->
12629:     ?KLIB:has_support_ipv6().
12630: 
12631: inet_or_inet6() ->
12632:     try
12633:         has_support_ipv4(),
12634:         inet
12635:     catch
12636:         throw:{skip, _Reason} ->
12637:             has_support_ipv6(),
12638:             inet6
12639:     end.
12640: 
12641: has_support_net_if_names() ->
12642:     try net:if_names() of
12643:         {ok, N} when is_list(N) ->
12644:             ok;
12645:         _ ->
12646:             skip("Not supported: net:if_names()")
12647:     catch
12648:         error : notsup ->
12649:             skip("Not supported: net")
12650:     end.
12651: 
12652: has_support_ioctl_requests() ->
12653:     try socket:supports(ioctl_requests) of
12654:         Reqs when is_list(Reqs) ->
12655:             ok;
12656:         _ ->
12657:             skip("Not supported: ioctl_requests")
12658:     catch
12659:         error : notsup ->
12660:             skip("Not supported: socket")
12661:     end.
12662: 
12663: has_support_ioctl_gifconf() ->
12664:     has_support_ioctl_request(gifconf).
12665: 
12666: has_support_ioctl_nread() ->
12667:     has_support_ioctl_request(nread).
12668: 
12669: has_support_ioctl_gifname() ->
12670:     has_support_ioctl_request(gifname).
12671: 
12672: has_support_ioctl_gifindex() ->
12673:     has_support_ioctl_request(gifindex).
12674: 
12675: has_support_ioctl_gifaddr() ->
12676:     has_support_ioctl_request(gifaddr).
12677: 
12678: has_support_ioctl_gifdstaddr() ->
12679:     has_support_ioctl_request(gifdstaddr).
12680: 
12681: has_support_ioctl_gifbrdaddr() ->
12682:     has_support_ioctl_request(gifbrdaddr).
12683: 
12684: has_support_ioctl_gifnetmask() ->
12685:     has_support_ioctl_request(gifnetmask).
12686: 
12687: has_support_ioctl_gifmtu() ->
12688:     has_support_ioctl_request(gifmtu).
12689: 
12690: has_support_ioctl_gifhwaddr() ->
12691:     has_support_ioctl_request(gifhwaddr).
12692: 
12693: has_support_ioctl_giftxqlen() ->
12694:     has_support_ioctl_request(giftxqlen).
12695: 
12696: has_support_ioctl_gifflags() ->
12697:     has_support_ioctl_request(gifflags).
12698: 
12699: has_support_ioctl_gifmap() ->
12700:     has_support_ioctl_request(gifmap).
12701: 
12702: has_support_ioctl_tcp_info() ->
12703:     has_support_ioctl_request(tcp_info).
12704: 
12705: has_support_ioctl_request(Req) when is_atom(Req) ->
12706:     try socket:is_supported(ioctl_requests, Req) of
12707:         true ->
12708:             ok;
12709:         false ->
12710:             skip(?F("Not supported: ioctl_request: ~w", [Req]))
12711:     catch
12712:         error : notsup ->
12713:             skip("Not supported: socket")
12714:     end.

12719: 
12720: unlink_path(Path) ->
12721:     unlink_path(Path, fun() -> ok end, fun() -> ok end).
12722: 
12723: unlink_path(Path, Success, Failure)
12724:   when is_function(Success, 0), is_function(Failure, 0) ->
12725:     case Path of
12726:         undefined ->
12727:             ?SEV_IPRINT("not a path to unlink"),
12728:                     Success();
12729:         _ ->
12730:             ?SEV_IPRINT("try unlink path: "
12731:                         "~n   ~s", [Path]),
12732:             case file:delete(Path) of
12733:                 ok ->
12734:                     ?SEV_IPRINT("path unlinked: "
12735:                                 "~n   Path: ~s", [Path]),
12736:                     Success();
12737:                 Error ->
12738:                     ?SEV_EPRINT("unlink failed: "
12739:                                 "~n   Path: ~s"
12740:                                 "~n   Res:  ~p", [Path, Error]),
12741:                     Failure()
12742:             end
12743:     end.
12744:

12749: %%     skip({not_supported, What}).
12750: 
12751: %% not_yet_implemented() ->
12752: %%     skip("not yet implemented").
12753: 
12754: skip(Reason) ->
12755:     throw({skip, Reason}).
12756: 
12757: 
12758: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
12759: 
12760: %% *** tc_try/2,3 ***
12761: %% Case:      Basically the test case name
12762: %% TCCondFun: A fun that is evaluated before the actual test case
12763: %%            The point of this is that it can performs checks to
12764: %%            see if we shall run the test case at all.
12765: %%            For instance, the test case may only work in specific
12766: %%            conditions.
12767: %% FCFun:     The test case fun
12768: tc_try(Case, TCFun) ->
12769:     ?TC_TRY(Case, TCFun).
12770: 
12771: tc_try(Case, TCCondFun, TCFun) ->
12772:     ?TC_TRY(Case, TCCondFun, TCFun).
12773:    
12774: 
12775: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
12776: 
12777: start_node(Name) ->
12778:     start_node(Name, 5000).
12779: 
12780: start_node(Name, Timeout) when is_integer(Timeout) andalso (Timeout > 0) ->
12781:     Pa   = filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
12782:     Args = ["-pa", Pa,
12783:             "-s", atom_to_list(?PROXY), "start", atom_to_list(node()),
12784:             "-s", "global", "sync"],
12785:     try ?CT_PEER(#{name      => Name,
12786:                    wait_boot => Timeout,
12787:                    args      => Args}) of
12788:         {ok, Peer, Node} ->
12789:             ?SEV_IPRINT("Started node ~p - now (global) sync", [Name]),
12790:             global:sync(), % Again, just in case...
12791:             ?SEV_IPRINT("ping proxy"),
12792:             case ?PPING(Node) of
12793:                 {error, Reason} ->
12794:                     skip({ping_failed, Reason});
12795:                 pong ->
12796:                     {Peer, Node}
12797:             end;
12798:         {error, Reason} ->
12799:             ?SEV_EPRINT("failed starting node ~p (=> SKIP):"
12800:                         "~n   ~p", [Name, Reason]),
12801:             skip(Reason)
12802:     catch
12803:         Class:Reason:Stack ->
12804:             ?SEV_EPRINT("Failed starting node: "
12805:                         "~n   Class:  ~p"
12806:                         "~n   Reason: ~p"
12807:                         "~n   Stack:  ~p",
12808:                         [Class, Reason, Stack]),
12809:             skip({node_start, Class, Reason})
12810:     end.
12811: 
12812:             
12813: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
12814: 
12815: i(F) ->
12816:     i(F, []).
12817: 
12818: i(F, A) ->
12819:     FStr = ?F("[~s] " ++ F, [?FTS()|A]),
12820:     io:format(user, FStr ++ "~n", []),
12821:     io:format(FStr, []).
12822:
